original: shes pa gcig la 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du khas len na 'dzin pa'i byed pa che'o zhes bya ba ni khrel ba gang byed pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa gcig la 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du khas len na 'dzin pa'i byed pa che'o zhes bya ba ni khrel ba gang byed pa'o //
translated: If you accept that a single cognition has the nature of both apprehending and not apprehending, then the function of apprehending is greater.

original: ci'i phyir gcig la gnyi ga'i rang bzhin med snyam na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gcig la gnyi ga'i rang bzhin med snyam na /
translated: Why do you think that a single cognition cannot have the nature of both?

original: shes pa yod pa yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa yod pa yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the cognition exists.

original: de'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba la gal te nga'i don 'jug na 'dzin pa'i byed pa med pa kho na'o //üîΩ'o na bzung ba la gal te de'i don 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba la gal te nga'i don 'jug na 'dzin pa'i byed pa med pa kho na'o // 'o na bzung ba la gal te de'i don 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, if the object of the cognition that is about to arise were to engage, then there would be no function of apprehending at all.üîΩBut if the object of the cognition that has already arisen were to engage, then there would be no function of apprehending at all.

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the object of the cognition that is about to arise were to engage, then there would be no function of apprehending at all.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: bzung ba la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bzung ba la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because the object of the cognition that has already arisen has already been apprehended.

original: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mi dmigs pa la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is not observed.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la 'dzin pa med pa nyid kyis the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la 'dzin pa med pa nyid kyis the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is doubt that the object of the cognition that is about to arise does not exist.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzung ba yin na'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzung ba yin na'o //
translated: If the object of the cognition that is about to arise were to engage, then there would be no function of apprehending at all.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dang da ltar ba de dang tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dang da ltar ba de dang tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the future is not different from the present.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzung na 'byung bar 'gyur pa nyid ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzung na 'byung bar 'gyur pa nyid ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: If you maintain that the future is not the future,

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then at that time

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyis bzung ba'i dus na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyis bzung ba'i dus na'o //
translated: at that time means at the time of direct perception.

original: ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not the future?

original: da ltar ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: da ltar ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it is the present.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If you say

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus gang yin pa de dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus gang yin pa de dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is related to the time of the future.üîΩWhy is the mere simultaneous occurrence of the present, etc. ,

original: ci'i phyir da ltar ba la sogs pa'i dus dang lhan cig spyod pa tsam nyid da ltar ba la sogs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir da ltar ba la sogs pa'i dus dang lhan cig spyod pa tsam nyid da ltar ba la sogs pa yin zhe na /
translated: the present, etc. ?

original: dus gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dus gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The other timeüîΩis not the present, etc.

original: dus de yang don nyid yin te /
analyzed: dus de yang don nyid yin te /
translated: That time is the object itself,

original: lhan cig spyod pa'i dus ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig spyod pa'i dus ni ma yin no //
translated: but not the time of simultaneous occurrence.

original: de ltar yin na ci skyon zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar yin na ci skyon zhe na /
translated: What is wrong with that?üîΩIf that were so,

original: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: then the present, etc.

original: lhan cig spyod pa yin dang ngo //
analyzed: lhan cig spyod pa yin dang ngo //
translated: would be simultaneous.

original: de'i ni dus kyi'o //
analyzed: de'i ni dus kyi'o //
translated: It is the time of that.

original: mi rtag pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is the impermanent one.

original: mi rtag pa'i don gang yin pa de dang lhan cig spyod pa nyid ni /
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i don gang yin pa de dang lhan cig spyod pa nyid ni /
translated: That which is the meaning of impermanent is the co-occurrence with that.

original: sgra'i 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yin te /üîΩdes na sgra khyab pa'i rang bzhin bzung yang don gzhan ma bzung bas the tshom za ba @186a * //
analyzed: sgra'i 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yin te / des na sgra khyab pa'i rang bzhin bzung yang don gzhan ma bzung bas the tshom za ba @186a * //
translated: The past and future of sound are impermanent.

original: yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, even though the nature of sound pervades, since another meaning is not apprehended, there is doubt.

original: de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Thus, that which is called ‚Äúimpermanent‚Äù

original: mi rtag pa'i don gzhan ma bzung na /
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i don gzhan ma bzung na /
translated: if another meaning of impermanent is not apprehended,

original: mi rtag pa'i don gzhan dang lhan cig spyod pa nyid du bzung bar mi nus pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'i don dang lhan cig spyod pa nyid ngas bzung ba ni 'di nyid do zhes rnam pa de ltar dran par ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i don gzhan dang lhan cig spyod pa nyid du bzung bar mi nus pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'i don dang lhan cig spyod pa nyid ngas bzung ba ni 'di nyid do zhes rnam pa de ltar dran par ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: since it is not possible to apprehend the co-occurrence with another meaning of impermanent, how could it be remembered in the form ‚ÄúI apprehended the co-occurrence with the meaning of impermanent, this very one‚Äù?

original: lhan cig spyod pa mi rtag pa'i don dang lhan cig spyod pa ma bzung yang /
analyzed: lhan cig spyod pa mi rtag pa'i don dang lhan cig spyod pa ma bzung yang /
translated: Even though the co-occurrence with the meaning of impermanent is not apprehended,

original: byung ba dang 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni bzung ba kho na ste /
analyzed: byung ba dang 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni bzung ba kho na ste /
translated: the nature of the occurrence and the occurrence itself are apprehended.

original: des na dran pa 'di ni 'thad pa kho na'o zhes sems na /
analyzed: des na dran pa 'di ni 'thad pa kho na'o zhes sems na /
translated: Therefore, this memory is indeed tenable.

original: 'di yang ma dag pa ma yin no //üîΩci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: 'di yang ma dag pa ma yin no // ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: This is not correct.üîΩWhy?

original: rang gi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of the word ‚Äúown.‚Äù

original: byung ba dang 'byung ba ni sgra'i rang bzhin ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni /
analyzed: byung ba dang 'byung ba ni sgra'i rang bzhin ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni /
translated: The arising and the one who arises are not of the nature of sound.

original: khyed nyid kyi 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: khyed nyid kyi 'dod pa yin te /
translated: This is your own belief.üîΩThe meaning of impermanence is the arising and the one who arises.

original: mi rtag pa'i don dang lhan cig spyod pa ni 'byung ba dang 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i don dang lhan cig spyod pa ni 'byung ba dang 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because this is the context.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid 'dzin par mi 'thad pa des na'o //üîΩ'di nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid 'dzin par mi 'thad pa des na'o // 'di nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: Since it is not tenable that the arising itself is apprehended,üîΩthis is what is being said.

original: ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How?

original: mi bzung ba zhes bya ba ni gcig nyid do //
analyzed: mi bzung ba zhes bya ba ni gcig nyid do //
translated: The nonapprehension is the singularity.üîΩThe apprehension is the one who is apprehended.

original: 'dzin bzhin pa ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe 'dzin pa de'i tshe ni dran pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dzin bzhin pa ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe 'dzin pa de'i tshe ni dran pa ma yin gyi /
translated: When there is apprehension, at that time there is no memory.

original: 'on kyang bzung ba'i rjes thogs su yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang bzung ba'i rjes thogs su yin no //
translated: Rather, it is subsequent to the apprehension.

original: de ltar yin mod /
analyzed: de ltar yin mod /
translated: This is so.

original: de ltan yang bzung ba la ni ci ste mi dran zhe na /
analyzed: de ltan yang bzung ba la ni ci ste mi dran zhe na /
translated: But why is it not remembered as apprehended?

original: 'das par bzung ba yin na ni /
analyzed: 'das par bzung ba yin na ni /
translated: If it is remembered as past,

original: bzung ba de'i rang bzhin med par 'gyur la /
analyzed: bzung ba de'i rang bzhin med par 'gyur la /
translated: then the nature of the apprehended object would not exist.

original: de ltar gyur na yang de dran par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na yang de dran par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And if that were so, it would not be remembered.

original: 'on te sngar mthong ba dran pas shes pas so //
analyzed: 'on te sngar mthong ba dran pas shes pas so //
translated: But if it is remembered because it was seen before,

original: des na der dran pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na der dran pa yin no zhe na /
translated: then it is remembered as that.

original: dran pa da ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dran pa da ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said to be present memory.

original: de'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it has the aspect of that.

original: brjod pa sngar mthong ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: brjod pa sngar mthong ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: It is said that what was seen before does not exist,

original: rang gi mthong ba bskyed nas zhig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi mthong ba bskyed nas zhig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has ceased after producing its own seeing.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dngos med rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dngos med rang bzhin yin no //
translated: For that very reason, it is the nature of a non-thing.

original: de ltar yin dang / ci ltar sngar mthong ba'i rnam pa nyid kyis dran pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yin dang / ci ltar sngar mthong ba'i rnam pa nyid kyis dran pa yin no //
translated: If that is so, how is it remembered by the aspect of what was seen before?

original: de'i rnam pa can ma yin pas ni de shes par nus pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa can ma yin pas ni de shes par nus pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not possible to know that by something that does not have its aspect,

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: because that would lead to an absurd consequence.

original: de min rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de min rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Otherwise, it is called ‚Äúnature.‚Äù

original: de'i tshe'ang zhes bya ba ni dran pa'i dus na yang ngo //
analyzed: de'i tshe'ang zhes bya ba ni dran pa'i dus na yang ngo //
translated: Also at that time means also at the time of memory.

original: gal te bdag ni 'dzin pa la nus pa yin gyi dran pa la ni ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te bdag ni 'dzin pa la nus pa yin gyi dran pa la ni ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the self capable of apprehending, not of remembering?üîΩSo how can it be said that it knows the object previously?

original: des na ci ltar 'dis snga ma nyid shes so zhes dogs pa bsu nas brjod pa ni /
analyzed: des na ci ltar 'dis snga ma nyid shes so zhes dogs pa bsu nas brjod pa ni /
translated: In response to this doubt, he says:

original: 'dzin pa dang ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa dang ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not the apprehender,

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //üîΩci'i phyir @186b zhe na /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no // ci'i phyir @186b zhe na /
translated: If, etc., is the response.üîΩWhy?

original: de'i ngo bo zhes bya ba 'dzin pa dang dran pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo zhes bya ba 'dzin pa dang dran pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not the nature of that, i.e., because it is not the nature of the apprehender and the rememberer.

original: de zhes bya ba ni bdag go //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni bdag go //
translated: That means the self.

original: ci'i phyir 'dzin pa po dang dran pa po ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'dzin pa po dang dran pa po ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not the apprehender and the rememberer?

original: lus la yang zhes bya ba ste /üîΩ'dzin pa po dang dran pa po nyid thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus la yang zhes bya ba ste / 'dzin pa po dang dran pa po nyid thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the body, etc.üîΩBecause it would follow, absurdly, that the body would be the apprehender and the rememberer.

original: de las kyang 'dzin pa dang dran pa dag tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las kyang 'dzin pa dang dran pa dag tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because, even though it is not the apprehender and the rememberer, it is still the self.

original: skad cig drug gnas pa nyid mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir de ni de lta bu nyid ma yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skad cig drug gnas pa nyid mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir de ni de lta bu nyid ma yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not like that, because it is impermanent, since it endures for six moments.

original: lan ni nam mkha' la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni nam mkha' la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is: Space, etc.

original: de la ni nam mkha' la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: de la ni nam mkha' la sogs pa la'o //
translated: There, in space, etc.

original: de nyid kyi 'dzin pa dang dran pa dag go //
analyzed: de nyid kyi 'dzin pa dang dran pa dag go //
translated: Those are the grasping and the memory.

original: bdag ni rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhan du mi 'thad pa mthong ba'i don rjes su dran pa'i rang bzhin can las /
analyzed: bdag ni rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhan du mi 'thad pa mthong ba'i don rjes su dran pa'i rang bzhin can las /
translated: The self is connected, because it is seen that the memory of the object is not tenable otherwise.

original: 'dzin pa dang dran pa dang ldan du yongs su rtog na de lta na ni nam mkha' la sogs pa la yang de dang ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dzin pa dang dran pa dang ldan du yongs su rtog na de lta na ni nam mkha' la sogs pa la yang de dang ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: If grasping and memory are imagined to be connected with the self, then space, etc. would also be connected with them,

original: rgyu mtshan mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reason is the same.

original: des na 'du ba med par ma grub bo zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na 'du ba med par ma grub bo zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the non-existence of the collection is not established.

original: gzhan yang rtsod pa ni 'du bas ldan pa de la yang mtshungs te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rtsod pa ni 'du bas ldan pa de la yang mtshungs te /
translated: Moreover, the objection is: That connection is also the same as the possession.

original: dper na bdag la de nyid kyis 'du ba yod pa de bzhin du nam mkha' la sogs pa la yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper na bdag la de nyid kyis 'du ba yod pa de bzhin du nam mkha' la sogs pa la yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For example, just as the self has contact with that, so also space and so on would have contact with it.

original: gang zhig med na gang mi 'thad snyam na /
analyzed: gang zhig med na gang mi 'thad snyam na /
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúWhat is not tenable if what is absent is what?‚Äù

original: sngon dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Prior‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di ni dran pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dran pa'o //
translated: This is memory.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod ces bya ba ni /
translated: ‚Äú It would be like this‚Äù means

original: dran pa'am dran par byed pa po nyid du'o //
analyzed: dran pa'am dran par byed pa po nyid du'o //
translated: that it would be like memory or the one who remembers.

original: brtsad pa dang yang mtshungs pa yin zhes bya ba rnam par 'brel ba ni /
analyzed: brtsad pa dang yang mtshungs pa yin zhes bya ba rnam par 'brel ba ni /
translated: ‚Äú It is also like a debate‚Äù is the connection.

original: 'brel pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Also‚Äù means in a connection.

original: 'di nyid ces bya ba ni bdag la 'dzin pa sogs pa'i 'brel pa bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'di nyid ces bya ba ni bdag la 'dzin pa sogs pa'i 'brel pa bzhin nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú Just this‚Äù means just like the connection of grasping the self and so on.

original: yang na zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i gnas skabs dag tu don gcig rtogs pa ci nas kyang 'gyur bar bya ba'i don du dran pa la sogs pa rtag pa nyid du khas blangs par bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i gnas skabs dag tu don gcig rtogs pa ci nas kyang 'gyur bar bya ba'i don du dran pa la sogs pa rtag pa nyid du khas blangs par bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Or‚Äù means that in order to understand the same object in the prior and subsequent states, memory and so on must be accepted as permanent.

original: gal te dran pa da lta kho na yod pa yin na de'i tshe rtag pa nyid mi rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te dran pa da lta kho na yod pa yin na de'i tshe rtag pa nyid mi rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: If memory exists only in the present, then it would not be possible to know that it is permanent.

original: des na dran pa ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus dag tu rjes su 'jug pa yin no zhes khas blang par bya'o //
analyzed: des na dran pa ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus dag tu rjes su 'jug pa yin no zhes khas blang par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it must be accepted that memory occurs in the past and future.

original: 'di ni 'dod pa kho na'o zhes dogs pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ni 'dod pa kho na'o zhes dogs pa ni /
translated: The opponent‚Äôs response to this argument is stated in the following:

original: de nyid ces bya ba ste dran pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ste dran pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to memory.

original: lan ni gang la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni gang la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to this is stated in the following:

original: 'das pa'i rang bzhin gang la 'dzin pa the tshom za ba de dran pas ni ci ltar shes /
analyzed: 'das pa'i rang bzhin gang la 'dzin pa the tshom za ba de dran pas ni ci ltar shes /
translated: ‚ÄúHow can one know that which is being held in the past, if one doubts its nature?‚Äù

original: dran pa ni 'dus pa'i dus de'i tshe med pa'i phyir snga ma nyid du ci ltar @187a * //
analyzed: dran pa ni 'dus pa'i dus de'i tshe med pa'i phyir snga ma nyid du ci ltar @187a * //
translated: How can one know the past, if memory does not exist at the time of the experience?

original: rtogs zhes bya ba de byung ba yin no //
analyzed: rtogs zhes bya ba de byung ba yin no //
translated: The response to this is stated in the following:üîΩ‚ÄúHow can one know the past, if one doubts its nature?‚Äù

original: de'i phyir ma bzung ba bzhin du bzung ba la yang ci ltar dran par 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di gnas so gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma bzung ba bzhin du bzung ba la yang ci ltar dran par 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di gnas so gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, how can one remember what one has not apprehended, just as one remembers what one has apprehended?

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The response to this is stated in the following:üîΩ‚ÄúBecause it is like that.‚Äù

original: 'on te bdag shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te bdag shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Or, ‚Äúthe self is known‚Äù and so on.

original: de ltan yang ci ltar sgra rtag pa nyid ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ltan yang ci ltar sgra rtag pa nyid ma yin zhe na /
translated: But how is sound not permanent?

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said.

original: gal te sgra rnams rtag pa yin na de'i tshe brtsal ma thag tu snga ma'i rang bzhin dang ma sbyar /
analyzed: gal te sgra rnams rtag pa yin na de'i tshe brtsal ma thag tu snga ma'i rang bzhin dang ma sbyar /
translated: If sounds were permanent, then it would not be possible to apprehend the prior nature without immediately applying effort to them.

analyzed: du ba dang shing sha ba la sogs pa'i don de ni me dang shing nyid la sogs @187b pa de dang 'khrul mi 'gyur zhes bya ba de lta bu'i don du 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs de gnyis rab tu phye ba yin no zhes bya

analyzed: tha dad pa ni zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: 'das nas yun ring du lon pa'i me dang 'brel pa yang yod do //

original: de dag gi gnas skabs kyi khyad par 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa des ni 'das pa dang dus mtshungs pa'i me de las rtogs pa kho na'o //üîΩdes na 'bras bu thal ba la sogs pa rnam pa ci 'dra ba zhig 'das pa'am /üîΩyul gzhan na gnas pa'i me las skye ba de lta bu ni 'das pa'i dus dang / yul gzhan na gnas pa'i me go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag gi gnas skabs kyi khyad par 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa des ni 'das pa dang dus mtshungs pa'i me de las rtogs pa kho na'o // des na 'bras bu thal ba la sogs pa rnam pa ci 'dra ba zhig 'das pa'am / yul gzhan na gnas pa'i me las skye ba de lta bu ni 'das pa'i dus dang / yul gzhan na gnas pa'i me go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: That which apprehends the particular condition of that fire, that alone understands the past fire.üîΩTherefore, the effect, such as the ash, arises from the past fire or from the fire located in another place, just as it does from the fire located in the present.

analyzed: gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ni sa bon dang myu gu la sogs pa yang ngo //

analyzed: gang gang zhes bya ba ni shing ngo // de ni shing sha pa'o//
translated: the tree.üîΩ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the ≈õim≈õapƒÅ tree.

original: @188b de'i ni shing nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: @188b de'i ni shing nyid kyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIts‚Äù refers to the tree‚Äôs.

original: spyir brjod pa'i don khyad par la ston pa ni /
analyzed: spyir brjod pa'i don khyad par la ston pa ni /
translated: The general statement is applied to the specific meaning.

original: shing sha pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shing sha pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú≈öim≈õapƒÅ tree‚Äù is the specific meaning.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù is the opponent‚Äôs position.

original: lan ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not‚Äù is the response.

original: rnam par dbyer med pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbyer yod pa can yin pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par dbyer med pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbyer yod pa can yin pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because it is not non-different. The meaning is: because it is different.

original: ci ltar rnam par dbyer yod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar rnam par dbyer yod pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it different?

original: shing ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shing ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The tree is.

original: des na sha pa'i go byed ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na sha pa'i go byed ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the tree is not the indicator of the shoot.

original: 'o na sha pa yang go byed du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na sha pa yang go byed du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Well, then, the shoot also would not be the indicator.

original: sha pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sha pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The shoot is.

original: de ltar na ni shing med par yod pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na ni shing med par yod pa'o //
translated: In that case, it would exist without the tree.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir na /
translated: For that reason,

original: sha pa de nyid rnam par dbyer med pa can gyi shing ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sha pa de nyid rnam par dbyer med pa can gyi shing ni ma yin no //
translated: that shoot is not the tree which is non-different.

original: rnam par dbyer med pa can gyi sha pa gang yin pa de go bar byed pa yin na /
analyzed: rnam par dbyer med pa can gyi sha pa gang yin pa de go bar byed pa yin na /
translated: If that which is non-different is the indicator,

original: de lta na ni de'i bdag nyid de ni go bar byed pa nyid kyi rgyur mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na ni de'i bdag nyid de ni go bar byed pa nyid kyi rgyur mi 'gyur te /
translated: in that case, that which is of the same nature would not be the cause of the indicator.

original: shing nyid sha pa nyid yin yang go bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shing nyid sha pa nyid yin yang go bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the tree itself, even though it is the shoot, is not the indicator.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni mi 'khrul pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni mi 'khrul pa nyid du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the same way‚Äù means ‚Äúwithout error.‚Äù

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba la ltos nas te du ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba la ltos nas te du ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAnother‚Äù means the probandum, i.e., the smoke.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa des na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa des na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause‚Äù means ‚Äúsince that is so.‚Äù

original: de'i bdag nyid du ni du ba me go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid du ni du ba me go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the smoke is not the reason for the understanding of fire.

original: des na rjes su 'gro ba dang bral ba'i bdag nyid ni /
analyzed: des na rjes su 'gro ba dang bral ba'i bdag nyid ni /
translated: Therefore, the nature of the absence of concomitance

original: go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid ma yin te /
translated: is not the nature of the reason for the understanding.

original: shing nyid la sha pa'i bdag nyid yod kyang go bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / med kyang du ba go byed yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shing nyid la sha pa'i bdag nyid yod kyang go bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / med kyang du ba go byed yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even though the nature of the ≈õim≈õapƒÅ exists in the tree, it is not the reason for the understanding, and even though it does not exist in the smoke, it is the reason for the understanding.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid la sogs pa med na /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid la sogs pa med na /
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means ‚Äúif the nature of the smoke and so on does not exist.‚Äù

original: mi 'khrul ba'i go byed nyid med pas na /
analyzed: mi 'khrul ba'i go byed nyid med pas na /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause‚Äù means ‚Äúsince the reason for the understanding without error does not exist.‚Äù

original: de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba de dag go bar byed pa nyid de'i rgyu mtshan can yin no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba de dag go bar byed pa nyid de'i rgyu mtshan can yin no //
translated: The nature of the smoke and so on is the reason for the understanding that has the nature of the smoke and so on as its cause.

original: 'o na go bar byed pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs rnam pa gcig kho nar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na go bar byed pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs rnam pa gcig kho nar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if the reason is the same in both cases, because it is the means of understanding?

original: de'i zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says, ‚Äúthat.‚Äù

original: gang gi dbye ba nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: gang gi dbye ba nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: The distinction is stated:

original: go byed ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: go byed ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúthe means of understanding.‚Äù

original: shing gi bdag nyid kyi sha pa ni /
analyzed: shing gi bdag nyid kyi sha pa ni /
translated: The post that has the nature of a tree

original: shing gi bdag nyid kho nas sha pa go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: shing gi bdag nyid kho nas sha pa go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: is the means of understanding the post only by virtue of having the nature of a tree.

original: tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not different.

original: rgyu'i zhes bya ba ni go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i skabs yin no //
analyzed: rgyu'i zhes bya ba ni go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i skabs yin no //
translated: The context is: ‚Äúthe cause is the means of understanding.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir de ltar gtan tshigs tha dad pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar gtan tshigs tha dad pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the reason is different in this way.

original: de nyid ci phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nyid ci phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba ma yin na /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba ma yin na /
translated: If it is not the same nature as that, nor does it arise from that,

original: go bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: go bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: it is not the means of understanding.

original: ldan pa can dang 'du ba can la sogs pa gang dag la de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba'i @189a * //
analyzed: ldan pa can dang 'du ba can la sogs pa gang dag la de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba'i @189a * //
translated: Those that are related, associated, etc., are not the means of understanding because they are not the same nature as that, nor do they arise from that.

original: mtshan nyid kyi 'brel ba yod pa ma yin pa dag ni gtan tshigs min zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi 'brel ba yod pa ma yin pa dag ni gtan tshigs min zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: It is said that those which do not have a relation of identity are not reasons.

original: gal te de 'dra ba'i 'brel ba med kyang ldan pa'i stobs kyis go bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de 'dra ba'i 'brel ba med kyang ldan pa'i stobs kyis go bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If one says that even though there is no such relation, it is understood by the power of possession,

original: ldan pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldan pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the response is ‚Äúpossession.‚Äù

original: 'on te me ni du ba med kyang yod pa des na go bar byed pa nyid ma yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: 'on te me ni du ba med kyang yod pa des na go bar byed pa nyid ma yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: If one says that even though fire exists without smoke, it is not the reason,

original: mi 'khrul ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi 'khrul ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the response is ‚Äúnonerroneous.‚Äù

original: lan ni'o na zhes bya ba'o //üîΩde ni zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'o //
analyzed: lan ni'o na zhes bya ba'o // de ni zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'o //
translated: The response is ‚ÄúWell then.‚Äù

original: lan ni me ni go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lan ni me ni go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The response is ‚ÄúFire is not the reason.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: yod pa zhes bya ba'o //üîΩrgyu dang 'bras bu nyid tha dad par khas blangs nas de skad brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: yod pa zhes bya ba'o // rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid tha dad par khas blangs nas de skad brjod pa yin no //
translated: The response is ‚Äúbecause it exists.‚ÄùüîΩHaving accepted that cause and effect are different, one says that.

original: da ni de med pa nyid do zhes brjod pa ni rgyu dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: da ni de med pa nyid do zhes brjod pa ni rgyu dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Now, in order to say that that is not so, it says ‚Äúcause‚Äù and so on.

original: 'on rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos pos go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di'i don ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos pos go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di'i don ci yin zhe na /
translated: But what is the meaning of this statement, ‚ÄúOne understands through the entity of cause and effect‚Äù?

original: des na zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des na zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said.

original: gzhan du 'gyur ba med do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan du 'gyur ba med do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThere is no change into something else‚Äù means

original: rgyu ni go bar byed pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu ni go bar byed pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: that the cause is not non-understandable.

original: 'on 'jig rten rgyu las 'bras bu dpog par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on 'jig rten rgyu las 'bras bu dpog par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if one infers the effect from the cause in the world,

original: de na zhes bya ba ste rgyu'i dngos po ni de ltar te /
analyzed: de na zhes bya ba ste rgyu'i dngos po ni de ltar te /
translated: then it is said, ‚ÄúThere,‚Äù that is, the entity of the cause is like that.

original: mtha'i skad cig nyid thob par ro //
analyzed: mtha'i skad cig nyid thob par ro //
translated: One obtains the very last moment.

original: mi nus pa yang 'bras bu mthong ba'i sngon rol du mtha' skad cig nyid du mi nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi nus pa yang 'bras bu mthong ba'i sngon rol du mtha' skad cig nyid du mi nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One is not able to ascertain the very last moment prior to seeing the effect.

original: ci ltar zhes bya ba 'bras bu yod pa dang med pa thun mong ba'i rang bzhin du shes pa de ltar ni rang bzhin des rgyu go bar byed pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: ci ltar zhes bya ba 'bras bu yod pa dang med pa thun mong ba'i rang bzhin du shes pa de ltar ni rang bzhin des rgyu go bar byed pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: Just as the existence and non-existence of the effect are known to be common natures, in just that way, by that nature, the cause is not understandable.

original: des ni zhes bya ba ni mtha'i skad cig thob pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: des ni zhes bya ba ni mtha'i skad cig thob pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that‚Äù means by the nature of obtaining the very last moment.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: 'di ltar zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes smos so //
translated: Thus, he says.

original: byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The word ‚Äúcause‚Äù is used

original: gal te mtha'i skad cig thob par byed na /
analyzed: gal te mtha'i skad cig thob par byed na /
translated: if the final moment is the cause of the cognition.

original: de'i tshe go bar byed pa nyid du yang 'gyur ba kho na'o //üîΩgo bar ma nus pa ni dngos po shes pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe go bar byed pa nyid du yang 'gyur ba kho na'o // go bar ma nus pa ni dngos po shes pa yang ma yin te /
translated: In that case, it is also the revealer.üîΩBut if it is not able to reveal, it is not the cognition of the thing,

original: 'on kyang rtogs pa po'i yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang rtogs pa po'i yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: but rather of the cognizer.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Thus, he says.

original: de ltar yin na 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang rgyu yin pa'i phyir 'di 'bras bu kho na'o zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar yin na 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang rgyu yin pa'i phyir 'di 'bras bu kho na'o zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: If that is so, then it is also the cause of the arising, and therefore it is only the effect.

original: de lta yin yang zhes bya ba ste mtha'i skad cig thob pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de lta yin yang zhes bya ba ste mtha'i skad cig thob pa nyid kyis so //
translated: But even if that is so, he says, because of the attainment of the final moment,

original: du ba de 'bras bu nyid yin no //
analyzed: du ba de 'bras bu nyid yin no //
translated: the smoke is the effect.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: du ba ni de med na med phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: du ba ni de med na med phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because the smoke does not exist without it.

original: gal te de ltar yin mod de ltan yang 'di ci ltar rgyu nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin mod de ltan yang 'di ci ltar rgyu nyid yin zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then how is it the cause?

original: tha dad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad ces bya ba'o //
translated: He says, ‚Äúbecause of the difference.‚Äù

original: de ltar 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po khyad par med pa'i phyir gnyi ga yang go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa nyid du brjod nas rang bzhin gyi gtan @189b tshigs la yang de'i bdag nyid khyad par med pa'i phyir gnyi
analyzed: de ltar 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po khyad par med pa'i phyir gnyi ga yang go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa nyid du brjod nas rang bzhin gyi gtan @189b tshigs la yang de'i bdag nyid khyad par med pa'i phyir gnyi
translated: Thus, in the case of the reason of effect, since there is no difference between the entity of cause and effect, both are described as that which is to be understood and that which causes understanding.

original: ga yang go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: ga yang go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: In the case of the reason of nature, since there is no difference in the nature of the two, both are the entity of that which is to be understood and that which causes understanding.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is meant by ‚Äúsimilarly.‚Äù

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs der yang /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs der yang /
translated: In the case of the reason of nature,

original: gal te sha ba'i bdag nyid la nges pa nyid du rtags na /
analyzed: gal te sha ba'i bdag nyid la nges pa nyid du rtags na /
translated: if the nature of the ≈õim≈õapƒÅ is ascertained as the sign,

original: de'i tshe shing yang rnam pa de lta bu'i shing yang go byed nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe shing yang rnam pa de lta bu'i shing yang go byed nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then at that time the tree is also understood as the sign that causes understanding of that kind of tree.

original: 'on te shing nyid sha pa la nges pa nyid du go bar rtogs pa pa de'i tshe ni go bar byed pa nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te shing nyid sha pa la nges pa nyid du go bar rtogs pa pa de'i tshe ni go bar byed pa nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But if the tree itself is ascertained as the sign that causes understanding of the ≈õim≈õapƒÅ, then at that time the tree itself does not exist as that which causes understanding.

original: 'on te de'i bdag nyid kyi go bar byed pa nyid du khas len na /
analyzed: 'on te de'i bdag nyid kyi go bar byed pa nyid du khas len na /
translated: But if you accept that it is the cause of understanding its identity,

original: de'i tshe de lta na yang zhes bya ba shing sha pa nyid kyi go bar byed pa nyid du khas blangs na yang shing sha pa nyid dang dbyer med pa ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe de lta na yang zhes bya ba shing sha pa nyid kyi go bar byed pa nyid du khas blangs na yang shing sha pa nyid dang dbyer med pa ste /
translated: then in that case, even though it is accepted that it is the cause of understanding the identity of a tree, it is not different from the identity of a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ tree.

original: de'i bdag nyid du rtogs pas 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid du rtogs pas 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: It is understood to be of the same nature as that.

original: gzhan du na go bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na go bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would not be the cause of understanding.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir shing nyid kyi dngos po ni sha pa nyid dang rnam par dbyer med pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir shing nyid kyi dngos po ni sha pa nyid dang rnam par dbyer med pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba yin te /
translated: Because that is so, the state of being a tree is to be understood as being inseparable from the state of being a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ tree.

original: de lta ma yin na go byed nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na go byed nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would not be tenable that it is the cause of understanding.

original: yang na de'i phyir zhes bya ba 'brel pa nges pa med par go byed nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir na dngos po me la sogs pa du ba la sogs pa la ltos nas sam /
analyzed: yang na de'i phyir zhes bya ba 'brel pa nges pa med par go byed nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir na dngos po me la sogs pa du ba la sogs pa la ltos nas sam /
translated: Or else, because it is not tenable that it is the cause of understanding without a definite relation, the state of being a thing, such as fire, is understood in reliance on smoke, etc.

original: du ba la sogs pa mang me la sogs pa la ltos nas 'bras bu dang rnam par dbyer med pa de dag gi dngos po des thams cad rtogs par 'gyur gyi 'ga' zhig nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa mang me la sogs pa la ltos nas 'bras bu dang rnam par dbyer med pa de dag gi dngos po des thams cad rtogs par 'gyur gyi 'ga' zhig nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: Since smoke and so on are inseparable from their effects, fire and so on, by means of that entity of theirs, all is understood, not just some part of it.

original: gal te rtags kyi go bar byed pa nyid nges pa'am /üîΩma nges pa zhig yin zhes dogs pa bsu nas /
analyzed: gal te rtags kyi go bar byed pa nyid nges pa'am / ma nges pa zhig yin zhes dogs pa bsu nas /
translated: If the evidence is ascertained as being the cause of understanding,üîΩor is it not ascertained?üîΩThe response to this qualm is:

original: ma nges ba kho na yin zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: ma nges ba kho na yin zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: It is not ascertained.

original: ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How?

original: de'i zhes bya ba khyab par bya ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba khyab par bya ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the pervaded.

original: shing nyid la sogs pa yod do cog na /
analyzed: shing nyid la sogs pa yod do cog na /
translated: When there is only treehood and so on,

original: sha pa nyid la sogs pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sha pa nyid la sogs pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: there is no existence of deerhood and so on.

original: de bzhin du go bar byed pa yang zhes bya ba ni /üîΩshing nyid la sogs pa sha ba la sogs pa la ltos nas go bar byed pa nyid kyang ma nges pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du go bar byed pa yang zhes bya ba ni / shing nyid la sogs pa sha ba la sogs pa la ltos nas go bar byed pa nyid kyang ma nges pa kho na yin te /
translated: Similarly, the evidence is also

original: res 'ga' ba kho nas yin no //
analyzed: res 'ga' ba kho nas yin no //
translated: not ascertained as being the cause of understanding, in dependence on deerhood and so on, because it is only sometimes that there is understanding.

original: ma nges pa yin na zhes bya ba ma nges pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yin na /
analyzed: ma nges pa yin na zhes bya ba ma nges pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yin na /
translated: If it is uncertain, then, if it has the nature of uncertainty,

original: sgra gang gis go bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra gang gis go bar byed pa yin te /
translated: by what sound is it made understood?

original: go bar byed pa nyid ci ltar nges pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: go bar byed pa nyid ci ltar nges pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: How can it be made understood if it is uncertain?

original: lan ni ma nges pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni ma nges pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is: ‚ÄúBecause of uncertainty.‚Äù

original: shing la sogs pa dang / du ba la sogs pa'i go bar byed pa nyid gang yin pa de'i rgyu mtshan de'i bdag nyid dang / @190a * //
analyzed: shing la sogs pa dang / du ba la sogs pa'i go bar byed pa nyid gang yin pa de'i rgyu mtshan de'i bdag nyid dang / @190a * //
translated: The reason for the fact that the sound is a means of knowledge is that it is the cause of the understanding of the object.

original: de las byung ba nyid du nges pa gang yin pa de ni ma nges par te /
analyzed: de las byung ba nyid du nges pa gang yin pa de ni ma nges par te /
translated: The reason for the fact that it is a cause is that it is the nature of that or it arises from that.

original: res 'ga' ba nyid kyis yod pa'i phyir go bar byed pa nyid ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: res 'ga' ba nyid kyis yod pa'i phyir go bar byed pa nyid ma nges pa yin no //
translated: But that is uncertain, because it is sometimes the case that the sound is not a means of knowledge.

original: gal te rgyu mtshan ma nges na go bar byed pa nyid kyang de ltar /
analyzed: gal te rgyu mtshan ma nges na go bar byed pa nyid kyang de ltar /
translated: If the reason is uncertain, then the fact that the sound is a means of knowledge must be uncertain in the same way.

original: 'gyur dgos so zhes bya ba gang las yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'gyur dgos so zhes bya ba gang las yin zhe na /
translated: From what is this?

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is: ‚ÄúIf it is uncertain.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir gal te de'i bdag nyid dang / de las byung ba'i nges pa de'i rjes su 'jug pa yin pa de lta na de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba nyid du nges pa de go bar byed pa nyid de'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gal te de'i bdag nyid dang / de las byung ba'i nges pa de'i rjes su 'jug pa yin pa de lta na de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba nyid du nges pa de go bar byed pa nyid de'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Because if the ascertainment of identity and origination follows that, then the ascertainment of identity and origination would be the reason for understanding that.

original: de lta ma yin yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta ma yin yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it were not so,

original: de nges pa'i rjes su mi 'jug kyang de'i rgyu mtshan can yin na /
analyzed: de nges pa'i rjes su mi 'jug kyang de'i rgyu mtshan can yin na /
translated: then even though it does not follow the ascertainment, it would have that as its reason.

original: thams cad thams cad kyi rgyu mtshan can du 'gyur ro zhes ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad thams cad kyi rgyu mtshan can du 'gyur ro zhes ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, it would follow that everything would have everything else as its reason.

original: de'i phyir rtags kyi go bar byed pa nyid ni ma nges pa kho na ste rgyu mtshan ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes gnas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtags kyi go bar byed pa nyid ni ma nges pa kho na ste rgyu mtshan ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes gnas so //
translated: Therefore, the reason is only indeterminate, because the reason is indeterminate.

original: gal te ldan pa la yang /
analyzed: gal te ldan pa la yang /
translated: If it is related,

original: ldan pa can la sogs pa las bsgrub bar bya ba las tha dad pa'i phyir de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa yod pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: ldan pa can la sogs pa las bsgrub bar bya ba las tha dad pa'i phyir de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa yod pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: then because the probandum is different from the related and so on, does it not have the relation characterized by origination?

original: des na ldan pa can la sogs pa ci ste gtan tshigs ma yin zhes dogs pa ni /
analyzed: des na ldan pa can la sogs pa ci ste gtan tshigs ma yin zhes dogs pa ni /
translated: Therefore, why should the possessor, etc. not be reasons?

original: ldan pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldan pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in the verse refers to possession.

original: de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kho na bzhin du go bar byed pa yin pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kho na bzhin du go bar byed pa yin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúJust like that‚Äù means that it is just like the reason based on effect.

original: 'gog pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not a negation‚Äù means that it is not a negation.

original: sngar ni rnam 'grel 'di de'i bdag nyid dang / de las byung ba kho na go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di grub pa'i don du shes bar byed pa nyid du nye par bkod pa yin la //üîΩldan pas go bar byed pa yin na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas kyang sha pa dang du ba bzhin du /
analyzed: sngar ni rnam 'grel 'di de'i bdag nyid dang / de las byung ba kho na go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di grub pa'i don du shes bar byed pa nyid du nye par bkod pa yin la // ldan pas go bar byed pa yin na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas kyang sha pa dang du ba bzhin du /
translated: Previously, this commentary was set forth in order to establish the meaning of the statement that only identity and origination are the means of understanding.üîΩThe statement, ‚ÄúIf it is the means of understanding because of possession,‚Äù etc., was made in order to demonstrate the meaning of the statement that if the means of understanding is possession, then just like the possession of a tree and smoke,

original: shing dang me dag kyang go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di ston pa'i don du brjod pa yin gyi bshad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shing dang me dag kyang go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di ston pa'i don du brjod pa yin gyi bshad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: fire and a tree would also be the means of understanding. It was not made as an explanation.

original: da ni rtsod pa'i dgos pa bsu nas de dgag pas bshad pa'i phyir nye bar bkod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: da ni rtsod pa'i dgos pa bsu nas de dgag pas bshad pa'i phyir nye bar bkod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: Now, having introduced the purpose of the debate, in order to refute that, the author has set forth the following.üîΩThis is the distinction.

original: gang dag la de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa yod pa de dag ni gtan tshigs nyid yin par grub pa'i phyir ldan pas ci bya ste /
analyzed: gang dag la de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa yod pa de dag ni gtan tshigs nyid yin par grub pa'i phyir ldan pas ci bya ste /
translated: Since those that have the relation of the characteristic of origination from that are established as the reason itself, what is the use of the qualifier?

original: mi 'khrul pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi 'khrul pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because there is no error. This is the meaning.

original: ldan pa can gyi gtan tshigs gang zhig yin zhen /üîΩrten pa dang ldan pa can ni rten te zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ldan pa can gyi gtan tshigs gang zhig yin zhen / rten pa dang ldan pa can ni rten te zhes bya ba la /
translated: What is a qualifier reason?üîΩThe qualifier is the basis.

original: ldan pa can ni rten to //
analyzed: ldan pa can ni rten to //
translated: The qualifier is the basis.

original: gang dang zhe na rten pa dang ngo //
analyzed: gang dang zhe na rten pa dang ngo //
translated: What is it? It is the based.

original: gal te ldan pa ni gcig kho na la gnas kyi /
analyzed: gal te ldan pa ni gcig kho na la gnas kyi /
translated: If the qualifier exists in only one,

original: gnyi ga la ni mi @190b gnas pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gnyi ga la ni mi @190b gnas pa ma yin nam /
translated: and does not exist in both,

original: des na rtogs pa dang ldan pas can ni ston te zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: des na rtogs pa dang ldan pas can ni ston te zhes brjod ce na /
translated: then the possessor is taught to be the based.

original: ldan par mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ldan par mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because of the equality of the qualifier.

original: rten dang brten pa gnyi ga la khyad par med par ldan pa gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa gnyi ga la khyad par med par ldan pa gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the endowment that exists in both the basis and the dependent without distinction.

original: 'du ba can gyi gtan tshigs de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'du ba can gyi gtan tshigs de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the reason for the assemblage?üîΩThe assemblage is

original: 'du ba can ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'du ba can ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe collection‚Äù means the collection of the aggregates.üîΩ

original: de la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ldan pa can ni go bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ldan pa can ni go bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, an endowment with such an aspect is not an indicator,

original: de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: because there is no relation that has the characteristic of arising from that.üîΩThe four

original: bzhis ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bzhis ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The four are:üîΩ

original: 'du ba can yang go bar byed pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'du ba can yang go bar byed pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: The assemblage is also not an indicator.üîΩThe type

original: rigs kyang zhes bya ba'o //üîΩ'on te brten pa la sogs pa med na mi 'byung ba can gyi /
analyzed: rigs kyang zhes bya ba'o // 'on te brten pa la sogs pa med na mi 'byung ba can gyi /
translated: and also the family.üîΩBut if the supported, etc., do not occur, it does not occur.üîΩ

original: rten la sogs pa ni go bar byed pa yin gyi thams cad ni ma yin no zhes 'dod na /
analyzed: rten la sogs pa ni go bar byed pa yin gyi thams cad ni ma yin no zhes 'dod na /
translated: But if it is asserted that the basis, etc., that are not found in the absence of the dependent are the indicators, but not all of them,

original: de lta na 'on rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa kho na go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta na 'on rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa kho na go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin gyi /
translated: then in that case, the reason for the indicator is only the relation that has the characteristic of cause and effect.

original: ldan pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ldan pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But it is not the case that they are possessed.

original: 'on te gal te yang brten pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: 'on te gal te yang brten pa la sogs pas /
translated: But if you say that the mere support, etc.

original: rten la sogs pa tsam ni go bar byed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rten la sogs pa tsam ni go bar byed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: of the supported, etc. is not understood,

original: 'on kyang chu la sogs pa'i brten pas bum pa la sogs pa'i rten go bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang chu la sogs pa'i brten pas bum pa la sogs pa'i rten go bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: but rather the support of the pot, etc. is understood through the support of water, etc.

original: lan ni de lta na 'o na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni de lta na 'o na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response to that is, ‚ÄúWell then,

original: brten brten med na mi 'byung bas go bar byed pa nyid yin na de de lta na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid go bar byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: brten brten med na mi 'byung bas go bar byed pa nyid yin na de de lta na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid go bar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: if the supported, etc. is understood through the mere support, etc. that is not separate from it, then the state of cause and effect is understood,

original: ldan pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ldan pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but possession is not.‚Äù

original: dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: Anticipating an objection, he says,

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is said that the mere non-existence of the supported is not understood,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po la tha dad pa'o //üîΩde'i phyir zhes med na mi 'byung ba'i khyad par rgyu dang 'bras bu'i /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po la tha dad pa'o // de'i phyir zhes med na mi 'byung ba'i khyad par rgyu dang 'bras bu'i /
translated: then the state of cause and effect is separate.üîΩTherefore,

original: dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the distinction of non-existence without is the state of cause and effect,

original: med na mi 'byung ba'i khyad par can gyi 'brel pa yod pa yin na yang ;
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba'i khyad par can gyi 'brel pa yod pa yin na yang ;
translated: Even if there is a relationship of invariable concomitance,

original: med na mi 'byung ba'i khyad par de nyid bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa'i sgrub byed yin te /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba'i khyad par de nyid bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa'i sgrub byed yin te /
translated: the invariable concomitance itself is the reason for understanding the probandum.

original: ldan pa la sogs pa brtags pas ci bya /
analyzed: ldan pa la sogs pa brtags pas ci bya /
translated: What is the use of investigating possession, etc.?

original: gang gi phyir sgrub par byed pa bsgrub par bya ba la nges pa kho na 'brel ba yin pa dang / med na mi 'byung ba'i yang de nyid yin pa dang / nges pa med pa yang sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir med na mi 'byung ba kho na 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgrub par byed pa bsgrub par bya ba la nges pa kho na 'brel ba yin pa dang / med na mi 'byung ba'i yang de nyid yin pa dang / nges pa med pa yang sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir med na mi 'byung ba kho na 'brel pa yin no //
translated: Because the reason is only related to the probandum when there is certainty, and because invariable concomitance is also that, and because the absence of certainty is not a reason, therefore invariable concomitance alone is the relation.

original: 'on te med na mi 'byung ba yin mod /
analyzed: 'on te med na mi 'byung ba yin mod /
translated: But if it is invariable concomitance,

original: de rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then it is not the relation of cause and effect.

original: gzhan la gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan la gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called ‚Äúother‚Äù in relation to another.

original: bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs bshad pa'i skabs su'o //
analyzed: bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs bshad pa'i skabs su'o //
translated: It has been explained‚Äîin the context of explaining the inference for the sake of others.

original: gal te @191a * //
analyzed: gal te @191a * //
translated: If it is invariable concomitance,

original: dkyus 'di tsam gyi rnam 'grel mdzad pas ci zhig bshad pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: dkyus 'di tsam gyi rnam 'grel mdzad pas ci zhig bshad pa yin zhe na /
translated: What is the point of composing a commentary of this length?

original: rang bzhin du 'bras bu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin du 'bras bu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is: ‚ÄúThe result is called the nature.‚Äù

original: 'o na da ci 'chad snyam na brjod ba ni da ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na da ci 'chad snyam na brjod ba ni da ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What is being explained now? The answer is: ‚ÄúNow, I will explain.‚Äù

original: gal te 'di gnyis ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir nye bar bkod pa don med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di gnyis ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir nye bar bkod pa don med do zhe na /
translated: If these two are uncertain, then the example is pointless.

original: gzhan dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is: ‚ÄúOthers say‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: de la zhes bya ba ni khyad par la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni khyad par la sogs pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that case‚Äù means in regard to the distinction and so on.

original: de nyid ni go bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa nyid du ste slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos go bar byed pa nyid ma yin par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni go bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa nyid du ste slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos go bar byed pa nyid ma yin par bshad pa'o //
translated: That is not the meaning of the statement, because Master Dignaga explained that it is not the meaning of the statement.

original: gzhung gang gis she na /
analyzed: gzhung gang gis she na /
translated: By what text?

original: de la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is: ‚ÄúIn that text.‚Äù

original: re zhig tha dad pa go bar byed pa nyid yin pa'i dogs pa bsu nas sel ba ni /üîΩgal te gcig tu ldog pa can zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: re zhig tha dad pa go bar byed pa nyid yin pa'i dogs pa bsu nas sel ba ni /üîΩgal te gcig tu ldog pa can zhes bya ba ste /
translated: First, anticipating the doubt that the distinction is the meaning of the statement, he resolves it:üîΩ‚ÄúIf it is said that the distinction is the meaning of the statement, then the distinction would be the meaning of the statement.‚Äù

original: srog la sogs pa ni go bar byed pa kho nar rigs so zhes bya ba 'di ni bden ba zhig na'o //
analyzed: srog la sogs pa ni go bar byed pa kho nar rigs so zhes bya ba 'di ni bden ba zhig na'o //
translated: But this is not so, for it is only right that life and so on should be the reason for understanding.

original: gang gi zhe na /üîΩgal te gcig nyid la ste mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid las so //
analyzed: gang gi zhe na / gal te gcig nyid la ste mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid las so //
translated: Whose?

original: grub pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: grub pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: If it is of the very same thing, then it is only right that life and so on should be the reason for understanding.üîΩBut this is not so, for it is only right that life and so on should be the reason for understanding.

original: de ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is being said.

original: ci'i phyir ma grub ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma grub ce na /
translated: Why is it not so?

original: phyogs nyid las te gson po'i lus nyid la bdag med kyang srog la sogs pa 'jug go zhes bya ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bdag nyid 'khrul par dogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs nyid las te gson po'i lus nyid la bdag med kyang srog la sogs pa 'jug go zhes bya ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bdag nyid 'khrul par dogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the very same thing, for there is the possibility of error in the form, ‚ÄúLife and so on occur in the living body, even though there is no self.‚Äù

original: gal te gcig tu ldog pa can kho na ci ltar go bar byed pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gcig tu ldog pa can kho na ci ltar go bar byed pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan yin zhe na /
translated: If the reason for being the reason for understanding is only the same reversal, then why is it not so?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is being said.

original: gal te med na mi 'byung ba med na /
analyzed: gal te med na mi 'byung ba med na /
translated: If there is no non-occurrence without,

original: srog la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ldog pa gcig tu nges pa can yin par ji ltar brjod /
analyzed: srog la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ldog pa gcig tu nges pa can yin par ji ltar brjod /
translated: how can life and so on be said to be definitely the same reversal in the opposite case?

original: ldog pa gcig tu nges pa can de yang /
analyzed: ldog pa gcig tu nges pa can de yang /
translated: And that definite same reversal

original: ma 'brel pa dag la srid ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ma 'brel pa dag la srid ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not possible in things that are not related.

original: des na ldog pa 'dod pas 'brel pa yang khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: des na ldog pa 'dod pas 'brel pa yang khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one who accepts the exclusion must also accept the relation.

original: de nyid phyir na zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba nyid kyi phyir rjes 'gro gnas te de lta ma yin na /
analyzed: de nyid phyir na zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba nyid kyi phyir rjes 'gro gnas te de lta ma yin na /
translated: For that very reason, there is concomitance, i.e., the relation, because otherwise,

original: 'brel pa nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the relation itself would not be tenable.

original: de lta yin na go bar byed pa nyid du 'thad pa kho na'o zhes dogs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta yin na go bar byed pa nyid du 'thad pa kho na'o zhes dogs pa'o //
translated: If that were so, it would be tenable that the exclusion is the object of understanding.

original: rnam par 'grel pa ni srog la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'grel pa ni srog la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The commentary is ‚Äúlife, etc.‚Äù

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni ldog pa gcig tu nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni ldog pa gcig tu nges pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the exclusion being ascertained as one.

original: ci'i phyir mi 'grub ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi 'grub ce na /
translated: Why is it not established?

original: mi mthun pa'i zhes bya ba'o //üîΩrang gi sgo nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i zhes bya ba'o // rang gi sgo nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the incompatibility.‚Äù

original: gtan tshigs bdag nyid kyi sgo nas so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs bdag nyid kyi sgo nas so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom its own side‚Äù means from the side of the reason itself.

original: 'di nyid brjod pa ni gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid brjod pa ni gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is stated in ‚Äúby which.‚Äù

original: gal te rang gi sgo nas mi nus na /
analyzed: gal te rang gi sgo nas mi nus na /
translated: If it is not possible from its own side,

original: 'o na ci ltar rtogs snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar rtogs snyam na /
translated: how is it understood?

original: rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom the side of the concomitance.‚Äù

original: ci ltar rung ba la @191b sogs pa la rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas ldog pa 'grub pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ci ltar rung ba la @191b sogs pa la rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas ldog pa 'grub pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the exclusion is established by the method of positive concomitance,

original: gal te 'di la yang rjes su 'gro ba yod na de'i tshe ldog par 'gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: gal te 'di la yang rjes su 'gro ba yod na de'i tshe ldog par 'gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: if there were positive concomitance here, then there would be exclusion.

original: rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas kyang ldog ba ci ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas kyang ldog ba ci ltar rtogs she na /
translated: How is exclusion understood by the method of positive concomitance?

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of that.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni ldog pa mi 'phen na'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni ldog pa mi 'phen na'o //
translated: If it were not so, if exclusion were not indicated,

original: don 'di nyid gzhung 'dzugs pa ni /
analyzed: don 'di nyid gzhung 'dzugs pa ni /
translated: this very meaning is established by the text.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus.

original: gzhan rgyu ma yin par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan rgyu ma yin par 'dod pa'o //
translated: The other is asserted to be non-cause.

original: de ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: That is the effect.

original: rgyur 'dod pa de yod na'o //
analyzed: rgyur 'dod pa de yod na'o //
translated: If that is asserted to be the cause, it exists.

original: gzhan rgyu ma yin par 'dod pa med na yang 'bras bu med pa yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan rgyu ma yin par 'dod pa med na yang 'bras bu med pa yin pa'o //
translated: Even if the other is asserted to be non-cause, the effect does not exist.

original: des 'bras bur mngon bar 'dod pa'i rgyu nyid du nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des 'bras bur mngon bar 'dod pa'i rgyu nyid du nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, the cause is ascertained as the cause that is manifestly desired as the effect.

original: gang gi tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par 'grel pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par 'grel pa'o //
translated: When, etc. is the commentary.

original: de yod na ni tsan dan yod na'o //
analyzed: de yod na ni tsan dan yod na'o //
translated: If that exists, if sandalwood exists,

original: de'i ste tsan dan gyi 'bras bu yin no zhes so //
analyzed: de'i ste tsan dan gyi 'bras bu yin no zhes so //
translated: The fruit of that is the fruit of sandalwood.

original: de yang ni de yod na yod pa'o //
analyzed: de yang ni de yod na yod pa'o //
translated: And that exists when that exists.

original: de'i zhes bya ba rjes su 'gro ba'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'o //üîΩkhyad bar zhes bya ba ni thams cad bsdus par ro //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba rjes su 'gro ba'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'o // khyad bar zhes bya ba ni thams cad bsdus par ro //
translated: That is the nature of the pervasion.üîΩThe particular is the totality.

original: khyab pa'i rnam par brjod pa ni thams cad du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyab pa'i rnam par brjod pa ni thams cad du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression of the pervasion is ‚Äúin all cases.‚Äù

original: 'di nyid las ni zhes bya ba la sogs par ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nges par rjes su 'gro ba nges par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid las ni zhes bya ba la sogs par ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nges par rjes su 'gro ba nges par bstan pa yin no //
translated: In this very case, etc. shows the certainty of the relation of cause and effect.

original: de tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni gsal ba gcig la ltos pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nges pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: de tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni gsal ba gcig la ltos pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nges pa tsam gyis so //
translated: By that alone, etc. means by the certainty of the relation of cause and effect in regard to a single instance.

original: de zhes bya ba ni khyab pa'i rjes su 'gro ba rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni khyab pa'i rjes su 'gro ba rtogs pa'o //
translated: That is the understanding of the pervasion.

original: gal te yang da lta me las du ba skye bar rtogs pa yin yang /
analyzed: gal te yang da lta me las du ba skye bar rtogs pa yin yang /
translated: Even though one understands that smoke arises from fire at the present time,

original: gzhan gyi tshe gzhan las mi 'byung ngo zhes ci ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe gzhan las mi 'byung ngo zhes ci ltar rtogs she na /
translated: how does one understand that it does not arise from another at another time?

original: de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is the pervasion.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni khyab pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni khyab pa nyid du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù means ‚Äúin that case.‚Äù

original: de'i tshe nyid ces bya ba ni me las skye bar mthong ba'i dus nyid na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe nyid ces bya ba ni me las skye bar mthong ba'i dus nyid na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time‚Äù means at the time when smoke is seen as arising from fire.

original: gal te gzhan las mi skye ba nyid du rtogs pa la ci ste ltos she na /
analyzed: gal te gzhan las mi skye ba nyid du rtogs pa la ci ste ltos she na /
translated: But why should one rely on the understanding that smoke does not arise from anything else?

original: 'di 'di las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di 'di las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis from that‚Äù means ‚Äúthis smoke from that fire.‚Äù

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni me ma yin ba la'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni me ma yin ba la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúElsewhere‚Äù means ‚Äúfrom something other than fire.‚Äù

original: 'o na go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan gang yin zhe na /
translated: But what is the reason for the understanding?

original: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNevertheless‚Äù means ‚Äúin spite of that.‚Äù

original: gal te gzhan las du ba mi 'byung bar rtogs pa nyid ni 'di nyid las du ba 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te gzhan las du ba mi 'byung bar rtogs pa nyid ni 'di nyid las du ba 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If one understands that smoke does not arise from anything else, then the ascertainment that ‚Äúsmoke arises from fire‚Äù is established.üîΩBut if one does not understand that smoke does not arise from anything else, then the ascertainment that ‚Äúsmoke arises from fire‚Äù is not established.

original: gzhan las mi 'byung ba'i rnam pa la ni rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes dogs pa bsu nas brjod pa ni de ltar yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan las mi 'byung ba'i rnam pa la ni rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes dogs pa bsu nas brjod pa ni de ltar yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Anticipating this doubt, he says, ‚ÄúIn that case,‚Äù

original: gzhan las du ba mi skye ba'i rnam pa la yang /
analyzed: gzhan las du ba mi skye ba'i rnam pa la yang /
translated: even in the case of the understanding that smoke does not arise from anything else,

original: rtogs pa yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: rtogs pa yod pa nyid do //
translated: there is the understanding that smoke arises from fire.

original: gang dag gis she na /
analyzed: gang dag gis she na /
translated: By what means?

original: brjod pa de yod na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: brjod pa de yod na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If that is so, then,

original: @192a * // gzhan yod na du ba med pa de ma thag nyid du ste /
analyzed: @192a * // gzhan yod na du ba med pa de ma thag nyid du ste /
translated: if the other exists, the absence of smoke is immediately,

original: gyur pa nyid du nges pa'i rtogs pa po rnams la'o //
analyzed: gyur pa nyid du nges pa'i rtogs pa po rnams la'o //
translated: that is, directly, understood by those who understand.

original: de yod na med par rtogs pa nyid ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de yod na med par rtogs pa nyid ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it that the absence is understood if it exists?üîΩBecause it is seen that smoke does not arise from the other, such as water, etc.,

original: de las gzhan chu la sogs pa las me nye ba'i sngar du ba mi skye bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan chu la sogs pa las me nye ba'i sngar du ba mi skye bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: when fire is nearby.

original: de lta na yang mi mthun ba'i phyogs las log par the tshom za'o zhes dogs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang mi mthun ba'i phyogs las log par the tshom za'o zhes dogs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even so, there is doubt that it is reversed from the discordant side.

original: gzhan gyi khyad par ni sha za la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi khyad par ni sha za la sogs pa'o //
translated: The other is a particular, such as a ghost, etc.

original: 'on te gzhan nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir /
translated: But if there is no particular difference from the other,

original: chu la sogs pa las kyang ci ste mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: chu la sogs pa las kyang ci ste mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: why does it not arise from water, etc.?

original: gzhan zhes bya ba zhes smras so //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba zhes smras so //
translated: The other is said to be a particular.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni du ba gzhan gyi khyad par la yod pas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni du ba gzhan gyi khyad par la yod pas na'o //
translated: Therefore, because the other, smoke, exists, there is a particular.

original: 'on te me yod pa nyid la du ba yod do zhes nges pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on te me yod pa nyid la du ba yod do zhes nges pa yin te /
translated: But if it is certain that smoke exists only when fire exists,

original: des na ldog pa med par ci ltar ma nges she na /
analyzed: des na ldog pa med par ci ltar ma nges she na /
