analyzed: 'on kyang dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid yin na /
translated: but rather were to have the essence of the thing,

original: de'i tshe don rnams kyi chos gcig bsgrubs sam bkag pa na /
analyzed: de'i tshe don rnams kyi chos gcig bsgrubs sam bkag pa na /
translated: then when one property of the object is established or refuted,

original: bdag nyid thams cad bsgrubs pa dang bkag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid thams cad bsgrubs pa dang bkag par 'gyur ro //
translated: all of its properties would be established or refuted.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: bdag tha snyad med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bdag tha snyad med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the self is not a convention,

original: chos dang chos can dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos dang chos can dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the property and the object of which it is a property are not different.

original: 'on te tha dad pa 'dod pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te tha dad pa 'dod pa yin na /
translated: But if you maintain that they are different,

original: de'i tshe bsgrub pa dang ni dgag pa dag chos can gcig la 'du bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe bsgrub pa dang ni dgag pa dag chos can gcig la 'du bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then the establishment and the refutation would not be combined in one object.

original: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
analyzed: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
translated: What would be the problem?

original: gzhan dang gzhan bkag pa dang ni bsgrubs pa bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang gzhan bkag pa dang ni bsgrubs pa bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It would be like the refutation and establishment of other things.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni 'chad ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni 'chad ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù is the explanation.

original: ci te de ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci te de ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it were so,

original: des zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚Äúby that‚Äù

original: ba lang zhes bya ba lang bsgrubs pa na ba lang de'i bdag nyid dkar po nyid la sogs pa ma bsgrubs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ba lang zhes bya ba lang bsgrubs pa na ba lang de'i bdag nyid dkar po nyid la sogs pa ma bsgrubs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: When the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù is established, the whiteness, etc., which are of the nature of the cow are not not established, but are indeed established.

original: bsgrubs pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrubs pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.üîΩWhy?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩde yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù

original: ma bkag pa la yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ma bkag pa la yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The same is true of what is not refuted.

original: gal te chos gcig bkag pas thams cad ma bkag na de'i tshe bkag pa yang ma bkag par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te chos gcig bkag pas thams cad ma bkag na de'i tshe bkag pa yang ma bkag par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If one thing is refuted but not everything, then it follows that the refutation itself is not refuted.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said:

original: gal te chos rnams chos can las tha mi dad pa yin na de'i tshe chos brjod pa na chos thams cad brjod pa'i phyir chos gzhan ston par byed pa'i sgra gzhan dag don med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te chos rnams chos can las tha mi dad pa yin na de'i tshe chos brjod pa na chos thams cad brjod pa'i phyir chos gzhan ston par byed pa'i sgra gzhan dag don med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If phenomena are not different from the subject, then when one phenomenon is mentioned, all phenomena are mentioned, and so the other words that teach other phenomena would be meaningless.

original: ci'i phyir bsgrubs pa dang bkag pa dag / ma bsgrubs pa dang ma bkag par thal zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir bsgrubs pa dang bkag pa dag / ma bsgrubs pa dang ma bkag par thal zhe na /
translated: Why is it that when something is established or refuted, it follows that it is neither established nor refuted?

original: dum bur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dum bur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúin part.‚Äù

original: 'on te gcig bsgrubs pa'am bkag pa na /
analyzed: 'on te gcig bsgrubs pa'am bkag pa na /
translated: But if one is established or refuted,

original: de'i bdag nyid yin pa yang gzhan dag ni bsgrubs pa'am bdag pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid yin pa yang gzhan dag ni bsgrubs pa'am bdag pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then the others that are of the same nature as it are also established or refuted.

original: de sgrub pa dang 'gog pa'i sgra gzhan dag don med pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de sgrub pa dang 'gog pa'i sgra gzhan dag don med pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the words that establish or refute it are not meaningless with regard to the others,

original: sgra des zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra des zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said, ‚Äúby that word.‚Äù

original: de zhes bya ba ni dogs pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni dogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú It‚Äù refers to the doubt.

original: 'o na zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: 'o na zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: ‚Äú Well then‚Äù is the response.

original: gal te thams cad ma nges na /
analyzed: gal te thams cad ma nges na /
translated: If everything is uncertain,

original: de'i tshe khyed bsgrubs par 'dod pa gang yin pa de yang ma nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe khyed bsgrubs par 'dod pa gang yin pa de yang ma nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: then at that time, whatever you want to establish is also uncertain.

original: nges par yul du byas bam nges bzhes bya bar ni 'thad pa ma yin @204b no ;
analyzed: nges par yul du byas bam nges bzhes bya bar ni 'thad pa ma yin @204b no ;
translated: It is not tenable to say that it is ascertained as an object or that it is uncertain.

original: / rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa med pa'i phyogs kyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa med pa'i phyogs kyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no distinction means that it is not tenable to make a distinction.

original: gal te rnam par dbye ba med kyang rnam par dbye bar ci ste mi dmigs zhen dmigs pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te rnam par dbye ba med kyang rnam par dbye bar ci ste mi dmigs zhen dmigs pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: If there is no distinction, why is it not observed? It is observed.

original: 'dir ni skabs kyis yang dmigs pa'i sgrar brjod do //
analyzed: 'dir ni skabs kyis yang dmigs pa'i sgrar brjod do //
translated: Here, the word ‚Äúobserved‚Äù is used in place of ‚Äúdistinction.‚Äù

original: de zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa rnam par dbye bas na'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa rnam par dbye bas na'o //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to the distinction of the object.

original: gang gi phyir dmigs pa'i rnam par dbye bas yod pa rnam par dbye bar 'gyur ba des na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dmigs pa'i rnam par dbye bas yod pa rnam par dbye bar 'gyur ba des na'o //
translated: Because the distinction of the object is the distinction of existence.

original: gcig nyid la zhes bya ba ni chos du ma dang tha mi dad pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: gcig nyid la zhes bya ba ni chos du ma dang tha mi dad pa'i chos can no //
translated: ‚Äú In one‚Äù means in a single entity that is not different from many phenomena.

original: gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni dkar po nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni dkar po nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Another‚Äù means such things as whiteness.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni gcig nyid la nges pa dang ma nges pa nyid do ;
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni gcig nyid la nges pa dang ma nges pa nyid do ;
translated: ‚Äú This‚Äù means the certainty and uncertainty in one.

original: / gcig la yang nges pa dang ma nges pa nyid mi 'gal ba kho na'o zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: / gcig la yang nges pa dang ma nges pa nyid mi 'gal ba kho na'o zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The doubt that ‚Äúcertainty and uncertainty are not contradictory in one‚Äù is anticipated and answered in the phrase ‚ÄúIf you say that . . . .‚Äù

original: 'on te 'di ni mi 'thad do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te 'di ni mi 'thad do zhe na /
translated: If you say that this is not tenable,

original: mthong ba ni zhes smras so //
analyzed: mthong ba ni zhes smras so //
translated: we reply that it is seen.

original: de la yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚Äú In that‚Äù refers to the certainty and uncertainty in one.

original: nges pa dngos po'i yul can yin pa 'ba' zhig la ba lang nyid dang dkar po nyid nges pa dang ma nges par 'gal bar ma zad kyi 'on kyang sngon po dang skad cig ma dag la yang ngo //
analyzed: nges pa dngos po'i yul can yin pa 'ba' zhig la ba lang nyid dang dkar po nyid nges pa dang ma nges par 'gal bar ma zad kyi 'on kyang sngon po dang skad cig ma dag la yang ngo //
translated: Not only is it the case that the ascertainment of the nature of an entity is contradictory with the non-ascertainment of the nature of a cow or the nature of white, but also with the ascertainment of blue and momentariness.

original: ci ltar 'gal zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'gal zhe na /
translated: How is it contradictory?

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin pa'i nges pas gal te sngon po nyid du rtogs pa gang yin bde ni skad cig nyid du gnas par bsgrub ba dang bral bar te /
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin pa'i nges pas gal te sngon po nyid du rtogs pa gang yin bde ni skad cig nyid du gnas par bsgrub ba dang bral bar te /
translated: If the ascertainment of the nature of an entity is the understanding of blue, then it is devoid of the establishment of momentariness.

original: skad cig ma nyid gnod pa'i sngon po rtogs na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid gnod pa'i sngon po rtogs na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If the understanding of blue is harmed by momentariness, then it is not established.

original: de'i tshe byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa gzhan gyis skad cig ma nyid 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa gzhan gyis skad cig ma nyid 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, momentariness is not established by other proof-statements such as ‚Äúbecause it is produced.‚Äù

original: tshad mas te nges par grub pa'i sngon po'i rang bzhin skad cig ma nyid dang bral ba ni /
analyzed: tshad mas te nges par grub pa'i sngon po'i rang bzhin skad cig ma nyid dang bral ba ni /
translated: The nature of blue, which is established and ascertained by valid cognition, is not devoid of momentariness.

original: yod pa la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa gzhan gyis gnod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa gzhan gyis gnod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not harmed by other proof-statements such as ‚Äúbecause it exists.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù means:

original: de yang ni gnod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de yang ni gnod par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAnd that‚Äù means: the refutation.

original: gzhan gyis ni gnod byed kyis so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni gnod byed kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy another‚Äù means: by the refuter.

original: des na tshad mas grub pa la ni gnod pa med do //
analyzed: des na tshad mas grub pa la ni gnod pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no refutation of what is established by valid cognition.

original: des na sngon po'i rang bzhin nges pa ni /
analyzed: des na sngon po'i rang bzhin nges pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the ascertainment of the nature of blue

original: ma nges pa skad cig ma nyid kyi rang bzhin dang 'gal ba kho na'o //
analyzed: ma nges pa skad cig ma nyid kyi rang bzhin dang 'gal ba kho na'o //
translated: is only in conflict with the nature of the non-ascertainment of momentariness.

original: sngon po nges pa des so //
analyzed: sngon po nges pa des so //
translated: By that ascertainment of blue.

original: de zhes bya ba skad cig ma nyid bsgrubs pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba skad cig ma nyid bsgrubs pas kyang ngo //
translated: Also, by the proof of momentariness, which is called ‚Äúthat‚Äù.

original: sngon po dang skad cig mar nges pa dag ni phan tshun gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos po ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngon po dang skad cig mar nges pa dag ni phan tshun gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos po ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The ascertainment of blue and momentariness are not in a relation of mutual refutation. This is the meaning.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bsdu ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the inclusion‚Äù is said.

original: gnyi ga'i ni sngon po dang skad cig ma'i nyid do //üîΩci gang gis bsdu ba'i zhes brjod pa rnam pa gzhan yang @205a * //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i ni sngon po dang skad cig ma'i nyid do // ci gang gis bsdu ba'i zhes brjod pa rnam pa gzhan yang @205a * //
translated: Both are blue and momentariness.

original: yod dam zhe na /
analyzed: yod dam zhe na /
translated: Is there another way of saying what is called ‚Äúinclusion‚Äù?

original: ldan pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldan pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúPossession‚Äù is said.

original: de la bsdu ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de la bsdu ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa ni /
translated: Therein, the expression of the nature of inclusion is:

original: bsdu ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe collection‚Äù is the collection of the aggregates.

original: ci ltar 'di bsdu ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'di bsdu ba yin zhe na /
translated: How is it a collection?

original: chos zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe property‚Äù is the property of the object.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar ldan pa rnam pa du ma yod pa de'i phyir skabs 'dir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar ldan pa rnam pa du ma yod pa de'i phyir skabs 'dir ro //
translated: Since there are many such relations, in this context,

original: gnod pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni gnod par bya bas dpen pa nyid do //
analyzed: gnod pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni gnod par bya bas dpen pa nyid do //
translated: ‚Äúthe characteristic of the incompatible‚Äù is the absence of the incompatible.

original: sngon po gang la de dang 'brel pa yod pa ni ldan pa'i phyir sngon po 'dir ni de lhan cig mi rtag pa nyid ci ltar sdud pa de ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: sngon po gang la de dang 'brel pa yod pa ni ldan pa'i phyir sngon po 'dir ni de lhan cig mi rtag pa nyid ci ltar sdud pa de ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: Since blue is related to that, it is a collection because of the relation. But how could impermanence be collected here? It is not at all.

original: yang gnod pa'i mtshan nyid gnod par bya bas dben par 'dzin pa yin la /
analyzed: yang gnod pa'i mtshan nyid gnod par bya bas dben par 'dzin pa yin la /
translated: Moreover, the characteristic of the incompatible is the absence of the incompatible.

original: de dang ldan pa ni sngon por nges pa gang yin des na /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa ni sngon por nges pa gang yin des na /
translated: That which is related to that is the ascertainment of blue.

original: ci ltar 'dir sngon po nyid dang skad cig ma lhan cig ci ltar sdud pa de yang ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: ci ltar 'dir sngon po nyid dang skad cig ma lhan cig ci ltar sdud pa de yang ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: How could momentariness be collected with blue here? It is not at all.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir gnod bya skad cig ma nyid gnod par byed pa sngon po nyid dang lhan cig bsdus par 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gnod bya skad cig ma nyid gnod par byed pa sngon po nyid dang lhan cig bsdus par 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not suitable for the object of refutation, momentariness, to be included together with the refutation, blueness.

original: yang na gnod par byed pa sngon po nyid du nges pas ni /
analyzed: yang na gnod par byed pa sngon po nyid du nges pas ni /
translated: Or, because the refutation is ascertained as blue,

original: gnod par bya ba skad cig ma nyid sngon po nyid dang lhan cig bsdus par 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gnod par bya ba skad cig ma nyid sngon po nyid dang lhan cig bsdus par 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not suitable for the object of refutation, momentariness, to be included together with blueness.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is because of what is said next.

original: ci ltar bkag snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar bkag snyam na /
translated: How is it refuted?

original: des zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is because of what is said next.

original: skad cig gi rang bzhin dang bral bar bzung yang ci ltar des bkag snyam na /
analyzed: skad cig gi rang bzhin dang bral bar bzung yang ci ltar des bkag snyam na /
translated: Even if it is apprehended as devoid of the nature of momentariness, how is it refuted?

original: dben pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dben pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is because of what is said next.

original: ci'i phyir dngos po med pa'i tshad mas gnod snyam na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir dngos po med pa'i tshad mas gnod snyam na /
translated: Why is it harmed by the valid cognition of nonexistence?

original: mngon sum gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is because of what is said next.

original: med ces nges pa 'di nyid ni rang rgyud du tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: med ces nges pa 'di nyid ni rang rgyud du tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: This very ascertainment of nonexistence is not a valid cognition in an autonomous way.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir 'di ni 'bras bu yin te pha rol dag gi tshad ma dang 'bras bu dag tha dad par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ni 'bras bu yin te pha rol dag gi tshad ma dang 'bras bu dag tha dad par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because this is the effect, since the valid knowledge and the effect of others are accepted as different.

original: 'o na 'bras bu 'di'i tshad ma gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na 'bras bu 'di'i tshad ma gang yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is the valid knowledge of this effect?

original: de yis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yis zhes bya ba'o //

original: nges pa 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //

original: nges pa 'di gzhan du dben pa dmigs pa med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nges pa 'di gzhan du dben pa dmigs pa med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: This ascertainment is not a nonobservation of a hidden phenomenon.

original: gal te res 'ga' ni sngon po nges par mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe skad cig nyid la gang gis gnod snyam na gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te res 'ga' ni sngon po nges par mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe skad cig nyid la gang gis gnod snyam na gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If sometimes blue is not ascertained, then at that time, what is the harm in the momentariness? If it is asked, ‚ÄúIs it not the case that the ascertainment of the absence of blue is generated by the nonobservation of blue?‚Äù

original: der zhes bya ba dben par rtogs pa'i nges pa bskyed pa rung ba gyis so //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba dben par rtogs pa'i nges pa bskyed pa rung ba gyis so //
translated: It is suitable to generate the ascertainment that realizes the absence of blue.

original: 'og nas zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i skabs nas so //
analyzed: 'og nas zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i skabs nas so //
translated: Later means in the section on nonobservation.üîΩThe meaning of the general statement is applied to the specific case.

original: spyir brjod pa'i don khyad par la sbyor ba de la zhes bya ba ste de ltar gnas pa de la'o //
analyzed: spyir brjod pa'i don khyad par la sbyor ba de la zhes bya ba ste de ltar gnas pa de la'o //
translated: That is, it is like that. That which is abiding is like that.

original: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni sngon po'am de nges pas so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni sngon po'am de nges pas so //
translated: By that alone means by blue or the ascertainment of that.

original: gnod par byas pa'i skad cig @205b nyid de gzhan yod pa la sogs pa'i rtags las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pas ci ltar sgrub /
analyzed: gnod par byas pa'i skad cig @205b nyid de gzhan yod pa la sogs pa'i rtags las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pas ci ltar sgrub /
translated: How does the inference produced from the reason of the existence of another prove that the object of the former cognition is momentary?

original: des kyang zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi sngon po nges pas so //
analyzed: des kyang zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi sngon po nges pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that‚Äù means by the ascertainment of blue.

original: gzhan gyis ni skad cig nyid du rjes su dpog pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni skad cig nyid du rjes su dpog pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy another‚Äù means by the inference of momentariness.

original: gal te sngon gyi rtogs ba sngon por nges pa de dmigs pa dang bcas pas tshad ma yin no//üîΩde'i tshe sngon po nges pa'i rang bzhin la /
analyzed: gal te sngon gyi rtogs ba sngon por nges pa de dmigs pa dang bcas pas tshad ma yin no// de'i tshe sngon po nges pa'i rang bzhin la /
translated: If the former ascertainment of blue is a valid cognition because it has an object,

original: ci ltar skad cig nyid gsal ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ltar skad cig nyid gsal ba ma yin te /
translated: then at that time, how is the momentariness of the nature of blue not ascertained?

original: 'on te sngon por nges pa skad cig ma nyid bsgrubs kyang gsal bar ma byas so //
analyzed: 'on te sngon por nges pa skad cig ma nyid bsgrubs kyang gsal bar ma byas so //
translated: Or, if the momentariness of blue is established but not ascertained,

original: des na rjes su dpag des na rjes su dpag yin no zhe na /üîΩbshad ba skad cig ma nyid kyi don de sngon po nges bsags la bar ni ma byas la /
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag des na rjes su dpag yin no zhe na / bshad ba skad cig ma nyid kyi don de sngon po nges bsags la bar ni ma byas la /
translated: then it is an inference.üîΩIt is difficult to accept that the object of momentariness is not ascertained in the ascertainment of blue,

original: bsgrubs pas yang yin no zhes 'thad par dka'o //
analyzed: bsgrubs pas yang yin no zhes 'thad par dka'o //
translated: but is established by the inference.

original: gang gis phyir sngon po'i rang bzhin 'dzin pas nges pa yin yang de dang tha mi dad pa'i skad cig gsal bar ma byas so zhes bya bar yang ci ltar 'gyur te ma yin pa kho na'o //üîΩ'on sngon por nges ba skad cig ma nyid la ni gsal ba yin la /
analyzed: gang gis phyir sngon po'i rang bzhin 'dzin pas nges pa yin yang de dang tha mi dad pa'i skad cig gsal bar ma byas so zhes bya bar yang ci ltar 'gyur te ma yin pa kho na'o // 'on sngon por nges ba skad cig ma nyid la ni gsal ba yin la /
translated: Why is it that, although it is ascertained by the apprehension of the nature of blue, the momentariness which is not different from that is not ascertained? It is not so at all.üîΩBut the ascertainment of blue is the ascertainment of momentariness.

original: sngon po nyid la ni nges par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon po nyid la ni nges par byed pa yin no //
translated: And the ascertainment of blue is the ascertainment of momentariness.

original: des na skad cig ma nyid nges pa'i don du rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na skad cig ma nyid nges pa'i don du rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the inference engages in the ascertainment of momentariness.

original: skad cig 'dir ni nges pa gsal ba yin la /
analyzed: skad cig 'dir ni nges pa gsal ba yin la /
translated: The ascertainment of this moment is the ascertainment of the clear,

original: gzhan sngon po nyid la ni nges pa yin par ni 'thad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan sngon po nyid la ni nges pa yin par ni 'thad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin no //
translated: and the ascertainment of the other, blue, is not related to the ascertainment.

original: nges pa sngon po'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa yin na /
analyzed: nges pa sngon po'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa yin na /
translated: If the ascertainment is the apprehension of the nature of blue,

original: 'ga' zhig ni nges ba la 'ga' zhig ni ma nges so zhes mi 'thad do //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni nges ba la 'ga' zhig ni ma nges so zhes mi 'thad do //
translated: it is not tenable that some is ascertained and some is not ascertained.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba dngos po 'dzin pa'i phyir sngon po nges pa snga ma gang yin pa de nyid ma 'khrul par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba dngos po 'dzin pa'i phyir sngon po nges pa snga ma gang yin pa de nyid ma 'khrul par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Therefore, because it apprehends a thing, that which is ascertained as blue is itself non mistaken.üîΩ

original: yang na phyi ma skad cig ma nyid du rjes su dpog pa ma 'khrul bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: yang na phyi ma skad cig ma nyid du rjes su dpog pa ma 'khrul bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: Therefore, because it apprehends an entity, either the prior ascertainment of blue would be non-mistaken, or else the subsequent ascertainment of momentariness would be non-mistaken.

original: gnyi ga ma 'khrul pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyi ga ma 'khrul pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But both cannot be non-mistaken.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: yul gcig gi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yul gcig gi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of one object.

original: gang gi phyir yul gcig la phan tshun 'gal ba'i shes ba mi 'byung ba des na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yul gcig la phan tshun 'gal ba'i shes ba mi 'byung ba des na'o //
translated: Because with regard to one object, two mutually contradictory cognitions do not occur.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: But if,

original: chos can las dang phan tshun yang tha dad pa yin na'o //
analyzed: chos can las dang phan tshun yang tha dad pa yin na'o //
translated: the object and the subject are different from each other,

original: ci ltar rten gzhan med snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar rten gzhan med snyam na /
translated: how can there be a cognition of the object without a basis?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In that case,

original: rdzas dang yon tan de dag la rten gzhan gsum pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas dang yon tan de dag la rten gzhan gsum pa'o //
translated: the substance and the quality would have a third basis.

original: khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi zhes bya ba ni gzhi mthun pas khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi zhes bya ba ni gzhi mthun pas khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po rtogs pa'o //
translated: The expression ‚Äúdistinction and the basis of distinction‚Äù is a copulative compound, and the compound ‚Äúdistinction and the basis of distinction‚Äù is a tatpurusa compound. The cognition of the relation of qualifier and qualificand is based on a common locus.

original: sngon po yan 'gar ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i sgras rdzas dang bcas pa'i sngon po rtogs par byed pa'o //üîΩrigs @206a * //üîΩdang yon tan zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sngon po yan 'gar ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i sgras rdzas dang bcas pa'i sngon po rtogs par byed pa'o // rigs @206a * // dang yon tan zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase blue is not a separate entity means that the word blue causes one to understand blue that is associated with substance.

original: autpala nyid kyi rigs dang / sngon po'i yon tan autpala'i sngon bo'i sgra dag las rtogs pa yin na'o //
analyzed: autpala nyid kyi rigs dang / sngon po'i yon tan autpala'i sngon bo'i sgra dag las rtogs pa yin na'o //
translated: The phrase genus and quality means that the word blue lotus causes one to understand the genus of the lotus and the quality of blueness that is a property of the lotus.

original: de ltar na yang gzhi mthun ba mi rtogs so //
analyzed: de ltar na yang gzhi mthun ba mi rtogs so //
translated: Even so, the common locus is not understood.

original: ci ltar zhe na /üîΩgzhi brjod pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na / gzhi brjod pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How is that?

original: sngon po dang autpala'i sgra dag ni yon tan dang rigs rjod par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: sngon po dang autpala'i sgra dag ni yon tan dang rigs rjod par byed pa yin la /
translated: The phrase the word that expresses the locus means that the word blue expresses the quality of blueness and the word lotus expresses the genus of the lotus.

original: gzhi brjod pa'i sgra gsum ba yang med pas so //
analyzed: gzhi brjod pa'i sgra gsum ba yang med pas so //
translated: Since there is no third word that expresses the locus, the common locus is not understood.

original: rdzas nyid ces bya ba ni rdzas dang 'brel ba'i sngon po nyid rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas nyid ces bya ba ni rdzas dang 'brel ba'i sngon po nyid rtogs pa'o //
translated: The phrase substance itself means that the word blue causes one to understand blue that is associated with substance.

original: gcig gis zhes bya ba sngon po'i sgras so //üîΩgnyis pa ni yon tan dang rdzas so //üîΩgzhan gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gcig gis zhes bya ba sngon po'i sgras so // gnyis pa ni yon tan dang rdzas so // gzhan gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase by one means by the word blue.

original: autpala'i sgras kyang ngo//
analyzed: autpala'i sgras kyang ngo//
translated: The phrase by the other means by the word lotus.üîΩThe phrase by the other means by the word lotus.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni gnyis brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni gnyis brjod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù indicates the two.

original: bzhi'am zhes bya ba ni sgra gnyis kyis gnyis gnyis brjod pas so //
analyzed: bzhi'am zhes bya ba ni sgra gnyis kyis gnyis gnyis brjod pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúFour‚Äù indicates two pairs, by the two words.

original: gsum zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i sgras rdzas dang yon tan gnyis dang autpala'i sgras rigs brjod na'o //
analyzed: gsum zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i sgras rdzas dang yon tan gnyis dang autpala'i sgras rigs brjod na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThree‚Äù indicates two, by the word ‚Äúblue‚Äù and one by the word ‚Äúlotus.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir gzhi mthun pa med snyam na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gzhi mthun pa med snyam na /
translated: Why is there no common locus?

original: gcig gam zhes bya ba'o//üîΩdes na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gcig gam zhes bya ba'o// des na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúOne‚Äù indicates that.

original: yan 'gar ba rtogs par mi nus pas na'o //
analyzed: yan 'gar ba rtogs par mi nus pas na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù indicates that it is not possible to understand the individual words.

original: tha dad par rtogs pa bzhin zhes bya ba ni bum pa dang snam bu rtogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: tha dad par rtogs pa bzhin zhes bya ba ni bum pa dang snam bu rtogs pa bzhin no //
translated: ‚ÄúJust as the understanding of difference‚Äù is like the understanding of a pot and a cloth.

original: rigs ma nges ba ni autpala dang khu byug la sogs pa'i rigs la yod pas so //
analyzed: rigs ma nges ba ni autpala dang khu byug la sogs pa'i rigs la yod pas so //
translated: The genus is indefinite because it exists in the genus of lotus, cuckoo, and so on.

original: yon tan ma nges pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yon tan ma nges pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The quality is indefinite because

original: autpala la sogs pa ni sngon po dang gzhan la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: autpala la sogs pa ni sngon po dang gzhan la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: blue exists in a lotus and other things.

original: don de nyid ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: don de nyid ces bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning is just that.

original: mngon sum gyis nges par bskol ba nyid du yul du ma byas pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis nges par bskol ba nyid du yul du ma byas pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is that which is not taken as an object by a perception that is a selection.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni nges par bskol ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni nges par bskol ba nyid du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means as a selection.

original: de kho na bzhin zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad bar ngo //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad bar ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúJust as‚Äù means without difference.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: de nyid la zhes bya ba ni sngon po la sogs pa tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: de nyid la zhes bya ba ni sngon po la sogs pa tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that very thing‚Äù means in the non-difference of blue, etc.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad par ro //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that way‚Äù means without difference.

original: lan ni rtogs bzhin ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni rtogs bzhin ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is ‚Äúwhile the cognition is occurring.‚Äù

original: dogs pa ni nye bar zhes bya ba'o //üîΩsgra las shes pa 'jug pa ni /
analyzed: dogs pa ni nye bar zhes bya ba'o // sgra las shes pa 'jug pa ni /

original: sgra'i shes pa 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: sgra'i shes pa 'jug pa'o //
translated: is the engagement of a cognition of a word.

original: dogs pa ni dbang po'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dogs pa ni dbang po'i zhes bya ba'o //

original: lan ni dbang po nyid ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni dbang po nyid ni zhes bya ba ste /

original: sgra yang yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgra yang yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: 'on te rtogs pa la ltos te dbang po la khyad bar yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the difference in the sense faculty is in relation to the cognition,

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the doubt is ‚Äúif it is the case that . . .‚Äù

original: rgyang ring po nag nas pa la lkog tu gyur pa nyid du rtogs bar khas blangs nas nye bar gnas ba la ci ste de ltar rtogs zhes @206b brjod pa ni /
analyzed: rgyang ring po nag nas pa la lkog tu gyur pa nyid du rtogs bar khas blangs nas nye bar gnas ba la ci ste de ltar rtogs zhes @206b brjod pa ni /
translated: Having accepted that the distant is understood as hidden, why do you say, ‚ÄúHow is it understood in that way?‚Äù

original: gang du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Where‚Äù is the place.

analyzed: nye bar gnas pa gang du dngos po gnas pa der ci ltar gzhan lkog tu gyur ba nyid du rtogs /

original: dbang bo'i byed ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: dbang bo'i byed ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the sense faculty is not operative there.

original: dbang bo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbang bo zhes bya ba'o //

original: sgra ni dngos bo'i rang bzhin rtogs par byed par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra ni dngos bo'i rang bzhin rtogs par byed par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is accepted that sound makes known the nature of the thing.

original: dogs pa ni gsal ba nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: dogs pa ni gsal ba nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The doubt is stated in the words ‚Äúit is clear.‚Äù

original: gsal ba nyid med par khas blangs nas kyang nyes pa brjod ba ni /
analyzed: gsal ba nyid med par khas blangs nas kyang nyes pa brjod ba ni /
translated: Even though it is accepted that there is no clarity, the fault is stated in the words ‚ÄúIf it is clear.‚Äù

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú If it is clear‚Äù is the doubt.

original: de lta mod kyang zhes bya ba gsal ba nyid med kyang /
analyzed: de lta mod kyang zhes bya ba gsal ba nyid med kyang /
translated: ‚Äú Even though‚Äù is the absence of clarity.

original: autpala'i rdzas so sor nges pa der 'du ba'o //
analyzed: autpala'i rdzas so sor nges pa der 'du ba'o //
translated: The substance of the blue lotus is individually ascertained there, in the collection.

original: gzhan du zhas bya ba ni sngon po med par ro //
analyzed: gzhan du zhas bya ba ni sngon po med par ro //

original: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i sgra las sngon po nyid rdzas la gnas par rtogs na tshig gzhan sngon po'i sgras sbyor ba med bar 'gyur te don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i sgra las sngon po nyid rdzas la gnas par rtogs na tshig gzhan sngon po'i sgras sbyor ba med bar 'gyur te don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If that were so, then if one understood that the word blue refers to the substance blue, the word blue would not be connected to another word, because it would have no meaning.

analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni ma nges bar rjod bar byed pas na'o //

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: ma nges bar zhes bya ba'o // 'on te phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i phyir na /

original: gzhi mthun pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no zhen /
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no zhen /
translated: But if it is understood as a common locus because of mutual exclusion,

original: phan tshun zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phan tshun zhes bya ba'o //

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: zin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zin pa zhes bya ba'o //

original: sngon bo la sogs pa'i sgras sngon po la sogs pa'i don ma nges par brjod pa ni phan tshun rnam par gcod pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon bo la sogs pa'i sgras sngon po la sogs pa'i don ma nges par brjod pa ni phan tshun rnam par gcod pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The words blue and so on express the meaning blue and so on without certainty, but they do not mutually exclude each other.

original: rnam par gcod na skyon ci yod snyam na /
analyzed: rnam par gcod na skyon ci yod snyam na /

original: gal te zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If that were so, it is said.

analyzed: sngon po ma yin pa dang / autpala ma yin pa las rnam par gcod par byed na'o //

original: rnam par 'grel ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par 'grel ba ni /
translated: The explanation is:

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If one says...

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By another

original: autpala'i sgras so //
analyzed: autpala'i sgras so //
translated: is by the word lotus.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: mngon sum gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: By direct perception.

original: gzhan gyis ni sgra'am tshad ma gzhan gyis so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni sgra'am tshad ma gzhan gyis so //

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'khrul ba nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrul ba nyid du zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: 'o na zhes bya ba nas zhe na'i bar ni rtsod pa'o //

analyzed: sngon po'i sga brjod ma thag tu ni ci autpala'am de ste gzhan yin zhes the tshom za ba ni sgra gzhan las te /
translated: Immediately after the word blue is uttered, there is doubt as to whether it is a lotus or something else, due to another word,

original: autpala ba zlog pa yin no //
analyzed: autpala ba zlog pa yin no //

original: bsdu bas rtogs pa yang ci ste mi rtogs snyam na /
analyzed: bsdu bas rtogs pa yang ci ste mi rtogs snyam na /

original: bsdu bas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsdu bas zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: 'o na the tshom yang ci ltar ldog snyam na /

original: gang gi tshe zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhes bya ba'o //

original: gnyi ga yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnyi ga yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: is the word and the valid cognition.

analyzed: sngon bo dang autpala'i sgra dag gam de las byung ba'i shes pa dag go //
translated: The word ‚Äúblue‚Äù or the cognition that arises from it.

original: des ni sngon po'i sgras so //
analyzed: des ni sngon po'i sgras so //
translated: By that, the word ‚Äúblue.‚Äù

original: brtan par zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: brtan par zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚Äú Stable‚Äù means

original: autpala'i sgras ni autpala'i sgra las skyes pa'i rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: autpala'i sgras ni autpala'i sgra las skyes pa'i rtogs pa ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúlotus‚Äù is the cognition that arises from the word ‚Äúlotus.‚Äù

original: des bzlog par bya ba'o //üîΩci ltar sgra @207a * //
analyzed: des bzlog par bya ba'o // ci ltar sgra @207a * //
translated: It is to be negated by that.

original: gzhan las bzlog par 'thad ce na /üîΩde lta bu nyid ces bya ba ste bzlog par gos pa nyid ni /
analyzed: gzhan las bzlog par 'thad ce na / de lta bu nyid ces bya ba ste bzlog par gos pa nyid ni /
translated: How is it tenable to negate it by another word?üîΩ‚Äú Just like that‚Äù means that the negation is not like that,

original: de lta bur gyur ba ma yin par te bzlog par mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur ba ma yin par te bzlog par mi nus pa'o //

original: autpala'i sgras ni autpala'i ma yin pa las zlog par byed ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: autpala'i sgras ni autpala'i ma yin pa las zlog par byed ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúlotus‚Äù negates what is not a lotus.

original: gang phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: gang phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of the passage beginning with ‚Äúbecause‚Äù is as follows.

original: sngon po'i sgras dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sngon po'i sgras dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the word ‚Äúblue‚Äù makes one understand the nature of a thing,

original: autpala ma yin pa las ldog pa nyid kyang rtogs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: autpala ma yin pa las ldog pa nyid kyang rtogs pa kho na'o //
translated: one also understands the negation of what is not a lotus.

original: des na autpala'i sgras bya ba ci yod de /
analyzed: des na autpala'i sgras bya ba ci yod de /

original: rtogs zin pa rtogs par byed pas dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs zin pa rtogs par byed pas dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because there is no purpose in understanding what has already been understood.

original: de nyid kyis ni sngon po'i sgras so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni sngon po'i sgras so //
translated: By that very [reasoning], the word blue is [a valid cognition].

original: sgra gzhan ni autpala'i sgra'o //
analyzed: sgra gzhan ni autpala'i sgra'o //
