original: rtogs pa snga mas zhes bya ba ni /üîΩsngon po'i sgra las skyes pas so //
analyzed: rtogs pa snga mas zhes bya ba ni / sngon po'i sgra las skyes pas so //
translated: The former understanding isüîΩproduced from the word blue.

original: phyi mas zhes bya ba ni autpala'i skra las skyes pas so //
analyzed: phyi mas zhes bya ba ni autpala'i skra las skyes pas so //
translated: The latter is produced from the word lotus.

original: tshad ma'i sgra zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tshad ma'i sgra zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The word valid cognition is

original: gal te sngon po'i sgra phyi'i don la tshad ma yin na de'i tshe des bstan pa nges pa nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni sgra phyi ma'am gzhan gyis gzhan du bya bar mi nus pa zhig na gzhan du byed pa yang yin te /
analyzed: gal te sngon po'i sgra phyi'i don la tshad ma yin na de'i tshe des bstan pa nges pa nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni sgra phyi ma'am gzhan gyis gzhan du bya bar mi nus pa zhig na gzhan du byed pa yang yin te /
translated: if the word blue is a valid cognition with regard to an external object, then what is not ascertained by that cannot be made otherwise by a later or other word. But it is made otherwise.

original: de'i phyir snga ma'am zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir snga ma'am zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said the former or later.

original: 'on te rjes su dpag par ni zhes bya bar don 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'on te rjes su dpag par ni zhes bya bar don 'di yin te /
translated: If it is inferred and so on, the meaning is this.

original: sngon po dang autpala'i sgra'am de skyed pa'i shes pa dag ni phan tshun gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i yul can du 'gyur gyis rjes su dpag pa ni med par sgrub pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: sngon po dang autpala'i sgra'am de skyed pa'i shes pa dag ni phan tshun gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i yul can du 'gyur gyis rjes su dpag pa ni med par sgrub pa'i phyir na /
translated: The words ‚Äúblue‚Äù and ‚Äúlotus‚Äù and the consciousnesses that produce them are mutually exclusive, so they would have a non-entity for their object.

original: me dang me ma yin pa la sogs pa thun mong pa'i ngo las gnod par byed pa kho na'o //
analyzed: me dang me ma yin pa la sogs pa thun mong pa'i ngo las gnod par byed pa kho na'o //
translated: Inference is only a fault in regard to the common appearance of fire and non-fire, etc., because it proves non-existence.

original: gnod bar bya ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gnod bar bya ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that which is faulted.

original: des ni ci ltar dngos po med pa'i yul can yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des ni ci ltar dngos po med pa'i yul can yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How could it have a non-entity for its object?

original: gnod bar byed pa nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gnod bar byed pa nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that which faults.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de yang zhes bya ba ste rjes su dpag pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ste rjes su dpag pa yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù is inference.

original: gal te rjes su dpag pas bzung ba nyid mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pas bzung ba nyid mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa ma yin nam /
translated: If what is grasped by inference is not grasped by perception,

original: des na ji ltar rjes su dpag pa la des gnod ce na /
analyzed: des na ji ltar rjes su dpag pa la des gnod ce na /
translated: then how can it be faulted by that?

original: rjes su dpag pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy inference‚Äù is said.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù is

original: rjes su dpag pa la yang rno ba dang 'bar ba la sogs pa'i khyad par la the tshom za ba kho na'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la yang rno ba dang 'bar ba la sogs pa'i khyad par la the tshom za ba kho na'o //
translated: In the case of inference, there is only doubt about the particulars, such as sharpness, heat, etc.

original: gal te khyad par la the tshom za bde lta na yang /üîΩspyi la ni ma yin no zhes dogs pa ni /
analyzed: gal te khyad par la the tshom za bde lta na yang / spyi la ni ma yin no zhes dogs pa ni /
translated: Even if there is doubt about the particulars,üîΩthere is no doubt about the universal.

original: spyi la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: spyi la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The universal is the object of doubt.

original: ci'i phyir the tshom gyi rang bzhin yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir the tshom gyi rang bzhin yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it the nature of doubt?

original: spyi rtogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi rtogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The universal is the object of doubt.

original: spyi zhes bya ba gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod ba ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi zhes bya ba gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod ba ma yin te /
translated: There is no other universal at all,

original: 'dir rgya cher bkag zin @207b pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir rgya cher bkag zin @207b pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has been refuted at length here.

original: 'on kyang khyad par de dag nyid nges par ma brtags pa ni spyi yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang khyad par de dag nyid nges par ma brtags pa ni spyi yin la /
translated: However, those very particulars, when not ascertained, are the universal.

original: khyad par nges par ma rtogs pa nyid kyang spyi rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: khyad par nges par ma rtogs pa nyid kyang spyi rtogs pa yin no //
translated: And the non-apprehension of the particulars is the apprehension of the universal.

original: des ni 'di the tshom gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ci skad brjod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi spyi la the tshom za ba kho na'o //
analyzed: des ni 'di the tshom gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ci skad brjod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi spyi la the tshom za ba kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, because it is the nature of doubt, there is only doubt about the universal that has the characteristic as stated.

original: ci ltar na de lta bur rtogs pa nyid spyi rtogs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar na de lta bur rtogs pa nyid spyi rtogs pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that such a realization is a realization of the universal?

original: spyi la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word in is used in the sense of in regard to the universal.

original: rnam par nges pa ni 'di ni khra bo kho na'o zhes so sor nges pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par nges pa ni 'di ni khra bo kho na'o zhes so sor nges pa'o //
translated: Determination is the ascertainment This is a cow.

original: 'di nyid brjod pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //üîΩba lang tsam du rtogs pa'i spyi gang yin pa de la ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid brjod pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o // ba lang tsam du rtogs pa'i spyi gang yin pa de la ni /
translated: The word thus expresses just that.üîΩIn regard to the universal cow which is realized as cow,

original: khra po la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba'i ba lang gi gsal ba yod do zhes rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: khra po la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba'i ba lang gi gsal ba yod do zhes rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: it is realized that there is an individual cow, be it a cow of a certain color or a cow of a certain shape.

original: ser po'am sngon po'i gsal ba rnam pa 'di lta bu zhig yod do zhes bya bar ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ser po'am sngon po'i gsal ba rnam pa 'di lta bu zhig yod do zhes bya bar ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not realized that there is an individual cow of such and such a color or shape.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni khyad par ma nges pa na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni khyad par ma nges pa na'o //
translated: The word then refers to the case where the particular is not ascertained.

original: 'chad ba ni spyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'chad ba ni spyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word universal is supplied.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni gsal ba rtogs pa mi 'dren pas so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni gsal ba rtogs pa mi 'dren pas so //
translated: The word then refers to the fact that the realization of the particular is not implied.

original: dogs pa ni gsal ba zhes bya ba'o //üîΩspyi khas blangs nas nyes pa brjod pa ni /
analyzed: dogs pa ni gsal ba zhes bya ba'o // spyi khas blangs nas nyes pa brjod pa ni /
translated: The word particular is supplied.

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The objection that the universal is not the object of the word is stated:üîΩIf the universal is the object of the word, then the particular is not the object of the word.

original: 'on te spyi don bya ba byed pa ma yin mod /
analyzed: 'on te spyi don bya ba byed pa ma yin mod /
translated: But if the universal does not perform the function,

original: de lta na yang bslad pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang bslad pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then it is not a real entity.

original: gang du don du zhes bya ba ste /üîΩdon bya ba nus pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: gang du don du zhes bya ba ste / don bya ba nus pa'i don du'o //
translated: In response to this, the treatise states:üîΩ‚ÄúIf it is not a real entity, then why is there doubt about it?‚ÄùüîΩThe term ‚Äúit‚Äù refers to the universal.

original: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni spyi la'o //
analyzed: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni spyi la'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúabout it‚Äù refers to the particular.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúdoubt‚Äù refers to the question.

original: spyi zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: spyi zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: The term ‚Äúuniversal‚Äù refers to the response.

original: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni gsal ba la'o //
analyzed: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni gsal ba la'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúabout it‚Äù refers to the particular.

original: gzhan ni spyi'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni spyi'o //
translated: The particular is the universal.

original: ha cang thal ba brjod pa ni nges pa thams cad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ha cang thal ba brjod pa ni nges pa thams cad ces bya ba'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthis is absurd‚Äù refers to the consequence that all determinations would be impossible.

original: 'di spong ba ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di spong ba ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to this is ‚Äúwhy?‚Äù

original: sred pa zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i chos can ni 'di nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: sred pa zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i chos can ni 'di nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: The term ‚Äúcraving‚Äù refers to the similarity between the particular and the universal.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúin this way‚Äù refers to the expression.

original: khyad par gang zhig spyi gang la srid pa'o//
analyzed: khyad par gang zhig spyi gang la srid pa'o//
translated: The term ‚Äúany‚Äù refers to the particular that is possible in the universal.

original: de zhes bya ba spyi mthong ba'i khyad par de nyid la'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba spyi mthong ba'i khyad par de nyid la'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúit‚Äù refers to the particular that is seen in the universal.

original: ci'i phyir de nyid la the tshom za zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de nyid la the tshom za zhe na /
translated: Why is there doubt about it?

original: the tshom ni srid pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: the tshom ni srid pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Doubt is with regard to existence and non-existence.

original: gang gis de mthong bas der the tshom du 'gyur ba gang zhig gang la srid pa dang 'khrul pa yang yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis de mthong bas der the tshom du 'gyur ba gang zhig gang la srid pa dang 'khrul pa yang yin zhe na /
translated: With regard to what is it doubted whether it exists or does not exist?

original: spyi la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: With regard to the universal.

original: skabs yin ba'i phyir na srid pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'khrul pa nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: skabs yin ba'i phyir na srid pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'khrul pa nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúexistence‚Äù is used here to indicate error.

original: don 'di nyid khyad par du ston pa ni ba lang nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: don 'di nyid khyad par du ston pa ni ba lang nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúcow‚Äù indicates the particular.

original: spyi zhes bya ba ni ma dmigs pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: spyi zhes bya ba ni ma dmigs pa kho na yin te /
translated: The universal is not perceived.

original: des nges pas khyad bar la the tshom za bar ci ltar 'gyur zhes lan 'debs pa ni /
analyzed: des nges pas khyad bar la the tshom za bar ci ltar 'gyur zhes lan 'debs pa ni /
translated: How can there be doubt about the particular because of the ascertainment of the universal?

original: khra bo zhes bya ba'o //üîΩgzhan spyi ni khyad par 'dir yod @208a * //
analyzed: khra bo zhes bya ba'o // gzhan spyi ni khyad par 'dir yod @208a * //
translated: The answer is:üîΩThe universal is not the particular.

original: pa min no //
analyzed: pa min no //
translated: The universal is not present in the particular.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni ba lang nyid la gzhan shing nyid du rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni ba lang nyid la gzhan shing nyid du rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the idea of a tree as different from the cow is a conceptual construction.

original: rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas kyang spyi rtogs pa mi rigs so zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas kyang spyi rtogs pa mi rigs so zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: It is not reasonable to understand the universal in any other way.

original: yang na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: or else.

original: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni /
analyzed: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni /
translated: The summary is:

original: des na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore.

original: khyad par gyi dbye ba yon tan dang / spyi la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: khyad par gyi dbye ba yon tan dang / spyi la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The analysis of the difference is the qualities, the universals, etc.

original: rtags yin pa des na'o //
analyzed: rtags yin pa des na'o //
translated: Since that is the mark, therefore.

original: the tshom med pas zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i shes pa dmigs pa dang bcas bas na bdag nyid thams cad nges ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: the tshom med pas zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i shes pa dmigs pa dang bcas bas na bdag nyid thams cad nges ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Since there is no doubt, because of the ascertainment with the object, all of the self is ascertained.

original: rdzas zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: The substance is the dispute.

original: ci lta bur gyur ba zhes bya ba ni sngon po zhes brjod pa na ci autpala'i khyad par can gyi rdzas sam ;
analyzed: ci lta bur gyur ba zhes bya ba ni sngon po zhes brjod pa na ci autpala'i khyad par can gyi rdzas sam ;
translated: What kind? When blue is stated, is it a substance qualified by a blue lotus,

original: de ste rnam pa gzhan yin zhes mi shes pa des na /
analyzed: de ste rnam pa gzhan yin zhes mi shes pa des na /
translated: or is it a different kind? Since that is not known,

original: autpala'i khyad par can gyi rdzas bstan pa'i don du autpala'i sgras autpala'i khyad par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: autpala'i khyad par can gyi rdzas bstan pa'i don du autpala'i sgras autpala'i khyad par bstan pa'o //
translated: in order to indicate a substance qualified by a blue lotus, the word blue lotus indicates a blue lotus.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni gal te sngon po'i sgras khyad par gcig gis khyad par du byas pa'i don de rang gi rang bzhin du rtogs par byas nas /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni gal te sngon po'i sgras khyad par gcig gis khyad par du byas pa'i don de rang gi rang bzhin du rtogs par byas nas /
translated: If, having understood the meaning qualified by one particular,üîΩthen at that time, since the particular of the lotus is also taught as the qualifier, what other particular of blueness, which is different from the previous one, is made the object by the word lotus, which is the class of that?

original: de'i tshe autpala'i khyad par gyis kyang khyad par can du bstan pa kho na yin pas de'i sngon po'i khyad par gzhan autpala nyid de autpala'i sgra las rigs gang yin pa des snga na med pa'i rang bzhin gzhan gang zhig yul du byed par 'gyur te mi 'gyur
analyzed: de'i tshe autpala'i khyad par gyis kyang khyad par can du bstan pa kho na yin pas de'i sngon po'i khyad par gzhan autpala nyid de autpala'i sgra las rigs gang yin pa des snga na med pa'i rang bzhin gzhan gang zhig yul du byed par 'gyur te mi 'gyur
translated: None is made the object.

original: pha des na des ni don med do ;
analyzed: pha des na des ni don med do ;
translated: Therefore, it is meaningless.

original: /'on te sngon po'i sgras sngon po'i khyad par nyid kyi khyad par can gyi don rtogs kyi /
analyzed: /'on te sngon po'i sgras sngon po'i khyad par nyid kyi khyad par can gyi don rtogs kyi /
translated: But if the word blue is understood to have the meaning qualified by the particular of blueness,

original: autpala'i khyad par can du yang ni ma yin no //
analyzed: autpala'i khyad par can du yang ni ma yin no //
translated: but not as qualified by the particular of lotus,üîΩthen the word lotus is meaningless.

original: des na autpala'i sgra don med do zhes dogs ba bsu nas sel ba ni /üîΩ'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na autpala'i sgra don med do zhes dogs ba bsu nas sel ba ni / 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In response to this qualm, the solution is:

original: sngon po'i sgras sngon po'i khyad par dang 'brel pa na /
analyzed: sngon po'i sgras sngon po'i khyad par dang 'brel pa na /
translated: But if the word blue is understood to have the meaning qualified by the particular of blueness,üîΩbut not as qualified by the particular of lotus,üîΩthen the word lotus is meaningless.

original: don de gzhan du zhes bya ba autpala nyid kyi khyad par dang 'brel par rtogs na ni /
analyzed: don de gzhan du zhes bya ba autpala nyid kyi khyad par dang 'brel par rtogs na ni /
translated: If the meaning of that is understood as connected to the particularity of the blue lotus itself,

original: de'i tshe khyad par gzhan autpala nyid dang 'brel bar autpala'i sgra las rtogs pas gzhan du zhes bya ba autpala'i nyid kyi khyad par can du byed par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe khyad par gzhan autpala nyid dang 'brel bar autpala'i sgra las rtogs pas gzhan du zhes bya ba autpala'i nyid kyi khyad par can du byed par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: then at that time, since the particularity is understood as connected to the blue lotus itself from the word ‚Äúblue lotus,‚Äù the word ‚Äúother‚Äù cannot serve to qualify the blue lotus itself.

original: tshig le'ur byas pa snga mas don med pa nyid du brjod pa'i lan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa snga mas don med pa nyid du brjod pa'i lan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: The response to the doubt that the earlier verse is meaningless is,

original: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBut if . . .‚Äù

original: autpala'i sgras ni /
analyzed: autpala'i sgras ni /
translated: The word ‚Äúblue lotus‚Äù

original: rdzas la autpala nyid kyi spyi dang 'brel ba kho nar rtogs kyi rdzas de'i khyad par sngon po'i sgras bstan par bya ba ni rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rdzas la autpala nyid kyi spyi dang 'brel ba kho nar rtogs kyi rdzas de'i khyad par sngon po'i sgras bstan par bya ba ni rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: is understood only as connected to the universal ‚Äúblue lotus‚Äù in the substance, but the particularity of that substance, which is to be indicated by the word ‚Äúblue,‚Äù is not understood.

original: des na autpala'i sgra don med pa ma yin no zhes bsams @208b pa'o //
analyzed: des na autpala'i sgra don med pa ma yin no zhes bsams @208b pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúblue lotus‚Äù is not meaningless.

original: de lta yin na zhes bya ba'i lan la ni don 'di yin te /
analyzed: de lta yin na zhes bya ba'i lan la ni don 'di yin te /
translated: The response to ‚ÄúIf that is so . . .‚Äù is as follows. The meaning of this is as follows.

original: gal te autpala nyid dang ldan pa kho nar rtogs kyi don bya ba byed pa'i autpala'i gsal ba ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te autpala nyid dang ldan pa kho nar rtogs kyi don bya ba byed pa'i autpala'i gsal ba ma yin na /
translated: If one understands only the lotus itself, and not the particular lotus that performs the function,

original: de'i tshe de ma grub pas na de la 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe de ma grub pas na de la 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then since that is not established, one would not engage in it.

original: de med pas de thob bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de med pas de thob bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And since that is not there, one would not obtain it.

original: khyad par khon don bya ba byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par khon don bya ba byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If the particular is the object of the function,

original: khyad par yan 'gar bas ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par yan 'gar bas ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the particular is the object of the function.

original: tshig le'ur byas pa dang po rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa dang po rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: The first verse of the treatise is commented on:

original: ci ste de'i sgo nas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ci ste de'i sgo nas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If it is by means of that,

original: autpala'i khyad bar gyi sgo nas so //
analyzed: autpala'i khyad bar gyi sgo nas so //
translated: by means of the particular of the lotus,

original: 'gog pa ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is not denied.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The particular.

original: khyad par snga ma sngon po nyid sngon po'i sgra gang la brjod par bya ba nyid du yod pa de nyid kyis rtogs zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par snga ma sngon po nyid sngon po'i sgra gang la brjod par bya ba nyid du yod pa de nyid kyis rtogs zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The previous particular, blueness, is understood by the word blue, which is the object of expression.

original: des na autpala'i sgra las khyad par gzhan brjod pa ni don med pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na autpala'i sgra las khyad par gzhan brjod pa ni don med pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the expression of another distinction from the word ‚Äúlotus‚Äù is meaningless.

original: tshig le'ur byas pa gnyis pa'i phyed snga ma rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa gnyis pa'i phyed snga ma rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: The first half of the second verse is commented on:

original: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBut if‚Äù

original: khyad par gzhan dang zhes bya ba ni autpala'i khyad par dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par gzhan dang zhes bya ba ni autpala'i khyad par dang bral ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúanother distinction‚Äù is the absence of the distinction of lotus.

original: rtsod ba byed pa nyid grub pa'i mtha' smra ba'i gzhung dbang po nyid du nye bar 'god pa ni /
analyzed: rtsod ba byed pa nyid grub pa'i mtha' smra ba'i gzhung dbang po nyid du nye bar 'god pa ni /
translated: The opponent‚Äôs position is presented as the standpoint of the proponent of the thesis:

original: de lta na yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEven so‚Äù

original: de'i phyir autpala'i sgra don med pa ma yin no zhes bsams pa'o//
analyzed: de'i phyir autpala'i sgra don med pa ma yin no zhes bsams pa'o//
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúlotus‚Äù is not meaningless.

original: phyed phyi ma rnam par 'grel pas lan 'debs pa ni /
analyzed: phyed phyi ma rnam par 'grel pas lan 'debs pa ni /
translated: The second half of the verse is commented on:

original: 'o na gal te zhes bya ba'o //üîΩkhyad par gzhan ni sngon po'i khyad bar gyis so //
analyzed: 'o na gal te zhes bya ba'o // khyad par gzhan ni sngon po'i khyad bar gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBut if‚ÄùüîΩ‚Äúanother distinction‚Äù is the distinction of blue.

original: gzhan du / gyur par zhes bya ba ni autpala nyid dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du / gyur par zhes bya ba ni autpala nyid dang bral ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù is the absence of lotus.

original: gzhan du byed ces bya ba ni autpala nyid dang ldan par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du byed ces bya ba ni autpala nyid dang ldan par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt would be different‚Äù means it would be endowed with a lotus.üîΩWhy?

original: gang gi phyir tshad ma te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir tshad ma te /
translated: Because it is a valid cognition.

original: sngon po'i sgras grub pa'i autpala nyid dang bral ba gang yin ba de ni gzhan du ste /
analyzed: sngon po'i sgras grub pa'i autpala nyid dang bral ba gang yin ba de ni gzhan du ste /
translated: That which is devoid of a lotus, established by the word ‚Äúblue,‚Äù is different.

original: autpala nyid dang bcas par byed nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: autpala nyid dang bcas par byed nus pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not able to be endowed with a lotus.

original: sngon po'i sgras ni autpala nyid dang bral bar rtogs pa 'thad pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon po'i sgras ni autpala nyid dang bral bar rtogs pa 'thad pa yang ma yin no //
translated: It is also not tenable to understand that the word ‚Äúblue‚Äù is devoid of a lotus.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'phrod pa 'du ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'phrod pa 'du ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called ‚Äúa combination of the two.‚Äù

original: de zhes bya ba ni thams cad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni thams cad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the nature of the inseparability of everything.

original: sngon po'i sgras autpala nyid dang yang ldan par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngon po'i sgras autpala nyid dang yang ldan par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it would be understood that the word ‚Äúblue‚Äù is endowed with a lotus.

original: des na autpala'i sgra don med do //
analyzed: des na autpala'i sgra don med do //
translated: Therefore the word ‚Äúlotus‚Äù is meaningless.

original: rtogs na ni zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i sgras autpala nyid dang bral ba rtogs na yang sngon po de nyid rdzas de'i rang bzhin @209a * //üîΩyin pas so //
analyzed: rtogs na ni zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i sgras autpala nyid dang bral ba rtogs na yang sngon po de nyid rdzas de'i rang bzhin @209a * //üîΩyin pas so //
translated: If it is understood, then even if the word ‚Äúblue‚Äù is understood to be devoid of a lotus, that blue is the nature of that substance.

original: gzhan gyi ni autpala'i sgras gzhan du ste autpala nyid dang 'brel bar byed par ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni autpala'i sgras gzhan du ste autpala nyid dang 'brel bar byed par ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: How could the word ‚Äúlotus‚Äù be applied to something else, i.e., to something that is not a lotus?

original: lhag pa bsnan ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lhag pa bsnan ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The addition of a qualifier is as follows:

original: autpala lhag par bsnan pa tsam zhig autpala'i sgras byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: autpala lhag par bsnan pa tsam zhig autpala'i sgras byed pa yin gyi /
translated: The word ‚Äúlotus‚Äù is used to add the qualifier ‚Äúlotus‚Äù to a substance,

original: autpala'i rang bzhin du ni ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: autpala'i rang bzhin du ni ma yin pa'o //
translated: but not to add the nature of a lotus.

original: gzhan las ni autpala'i sgra las so //
analyzed: gzhan las ni autpala'i sgra las so //
translated: From something else means from the word ‚Äúlotus.‚Äù

original: 'di skad brjod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not what is being said.

original: autpala'i sgra sbyar ba'i sngon rol du ni autpala'i chos dang ldan par yang ma rtogs la autpala ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan bar yang ma rtogs kyi /
analyzed: autpala'i sgra sbyar ba'i sngon rol du ni autpala'i chos dang ldan par yang ma rtogs la autpala ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan bar yang ma rtogs kyi /
translated: Prior to the application of the word ‚Äúlotus,‚Äù one does not understand that the substance possesses the qualities of a lotus, nor does one understand that it possesses the qualities of something that is not a lotus.

original: autpala'i sgra sbyar bas ni rdzas la autpala nyid lhag par rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: autpala'i sgra sbyar bas ni rdzas la autpala nyid lhag par rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: When the word ‚Äúlotus‚Äù is applied, one understands that the substance is qualified by a lotus,

original: autpa la ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: autpa la ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but one does not understand that it is distinguished from something that is not a lotus.

original: 'o na ci ltar autpala ma yin pa las ldog snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar autpala ma yin pa las ldog snyam na /
translated: How then is it distinguished from something that is not a lotus?

original: de las zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ste /
translated: From that means from the word ‚Äúlotus.‚Äù

original: autpala ma yin pa las ldog pa ni rdzas la autpala ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du mi srid bar nges pa gang de las yin te /
analyzed: autpala ma yin pa las ldog pa ni rdzas la autpala ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du mi srid bar nges pa gang de las yin te /
translated: The exclusion of non-lotus is ascertained as impossible in the substance.

original: des na autpala ma yin pa las ldog pa ni gzhan las grub la sgra las ni lhag par rtogs pa tsam zhig 'jug ba yin no //
analyzed: des na autpala ma yin pa las ldog pa ni gzhan las grub la sgra las ni lhag par rtogs pa tsam zhig 'jug ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the exclusion of non-lotus is established from another, and from the word, only the additional cognition of that is engaged.

original: ci ltar mi srid par nges she na /
analyzed: ci ltar mi srid par nges she na /
translated: How is impossibility ascertained?

original: de dang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de dang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is said, that.

original: rdzas de autpala de nyid kyi chos dang ldan par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes 'brel te /
analyzed: rdzas de autpala de nyid kyi chos dang ldan par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes 'brel te /
translated: It is connected as follows: that substance does not possess the qualities of that very lotus.

original: de las gzhan zhes bya ba ni autpala ma yin ba'i chos dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan zhes bya ba ni autpala ma yin ba'i chos dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It is said, from another, it also does not possess the qualities of non-lotus.

original: autpala nyid dang autpala ma yin pa nyid kyi chos dang ldan pa ni gcig par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: autpala nyid dang autpala ma yin pa nyid kyi chos dang ldan pa ni gcig par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not possible for one to possess the qualities of both lotus and non-lotus. This is the meaning.

original: ci ltar 'di mi bden snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'di mi bden snyam na /
translated: How is this not true?

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, if.

original: sngon po'i sgra la sngon po nyid khu byug la sogs pa dang mthun pa'am thun mong ma yin pa zhig rtogs /
analyzed: sngon po'i sgra la sngon po nyid khu byug la sogs pa dang mthun pa'am thun mong ma yin pa zhig rtogs /
translated: Is the meaning of the word blue understood as blue itself, or is it understood as something that is similar to or common to a cuckoo and so on?

original: de la gal te khu byug la sogs pa phyugs kyi khyad par rnams tshad mas te sngon po'i sgras thob par bstan na /
analyzed: de la gal te khu byug la sogs pa phyugs kyi khyad par rnams tshad mas te sngon po'i sgras thob par bstan na /
translated: If the particular animals such as a cuckoo are taught to be obtained by means of a valid cognition,

original: de'i tshe autpala autpala zhes de ltar lhag par stong phrag bsnan pas kyang thob pa de bzlog par ni mi nus so //
analyzed: de'i tshe autpala autpala zhes de ltar lhag par stong phrag bsnan pas kyang thob pa de bzlog par ni mi nus so //
translated: then even if one adds a thousand more such as an utpala flower, one will not be able to stop the obtaining of that.

original: tshad ma'i stobs kyis 'ongs pa ni sgro btags pas ldog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma'i stobs kyis 'ongs pa ni sgro btags pas ldog pa ma yin no //
translated: What has been obtained by the power of valid cognition cannot be stopped by superimposition.

original: gnyis bsal ba ni ;
analyzed: gnyis bsal ba ni ;
translated: The refutation of both

original: 'on te phyugs gzhan rnams thob pa med na /
analyzed: 'on te phyugs gzhan rnams thob pa med na /
translated: If the other animals are not obtained,

original: de'i tshe autpala'i don de nyid sngon po'i sgras bcad pa'i phyir de rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i tshe autpala'i don de nyid sngon po'i sgras bcad pa'i phyir de rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: then since the meaning of utpala is excluded by the word blue, it is understood.

original: autpala nyid bsnan ba'i khyad par gzhan gyi ci zhig bya /
analyzed: autpala nyid bsnan ba'i khyad par gzhan gyi ci zhig bya /
translated: So what is the point of adding utpala?

original: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Here,

original: bdag nyid thams cad kyis rtogs par la'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid thams cad kyis rtogs par la'o //
translated: it is understood by the whole of itself.

original: gang gi phyir autpala nyid du @209b sgro btags pa'i yul gyi khyad par gzhan gyis bzlog par bya ba ni ci'ang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir autpala nyid du @209b sgro btags pa'i yul gyi khyad par gzhan gyis bzlog par bya ba ni ci'ang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because there is no other particular object that is to be refuted, which is superimposed as a lotus.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bzlog par bya ba mad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bzlog par bya ba mad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means because there is nothing to be refuted.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid thams cad kyis bzung bas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid thams cad kyis bzung bas na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù means because it is apprehended in all its aspects.

original: tshad ma gzhan nam sgra gzhan gyis khyad par gzhan rtogs pa ni don med do //
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan nam sgra gzhan gyis khyad par gzhan rtogs pa ni don med do //
translated: It is pointless to understand another particular by another means of knowledge or another word.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi phyogs rjes su brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi phyogs rjes su brjod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù refers to the opponent‚Äôs position.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sun 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sun 'byin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù is the refutation.

original: tsam gyi sgras ni gsal ba rtogs pa 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: tsam gyi sgras ni gsal ba rtogs pa 'gog pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù refutes the understanding of manifestation.

original: mtshon pa'i spyis mtshon ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshon pa'i spyis mtshon ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the universal of the indicator is not the indicated.

original: ci ltar na de ltar rtogs na khyad par thams cad 'dzin snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar na de ltar rtogs na khyad par thams cad 'dzin snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúHow can one understand in that way and apprehend all the particulars?,‚Äù

original: mngon sum gyis ni de ltar zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ni de ltar zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the response is, ‚ÄúDirect perception understands in that way.‚Äù

original: khyad par thams cad dang ldan pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: khyad par thams cad dang ldan pa nyid du'o //
translated: It is in the possession of all the particulars.

original: mngon sum gyis kyang khyad par gyi tshogs mtha' dag dang ldan pa'i dngos po 'dzin pa ma yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis kyang khyad par gyi tshogs mtha' dag dang ldan pa'i dngos po 'dzin pa ma yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: Direct perception also does not apprehend a thing that possesses a complete set of attributes.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to this qualm is ‚ÄúBut if that were so . . .‚Äù

original: de'i tshe nam yang rdzas 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe nam yang rdzas 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: At that time, it would never apprehend substance,

original: thams cad du mdog dang dbyibs kho na 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad du mdog dang dbyibs kho na 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would always apprehend only color and shape.

original: nges pa ci yod snyam na /
analyzed: nges pa ci yod snyam na /
translated: What is the certainty here?

original: des ni zhes bya ste dmigs ba'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ma dmigs pas med ba'i phyir ro //üîΩde las rdzas gzhan zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: des ni zhes bya ste dmigs ba'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ma dmigs pas med ba'i phyir ro // de las rdzas gzhan zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: ‚Äú It would not be . . . ‚Äù means that it would not be the defining characteristic of perception because it would not be observed.

original: bdag de la rdzas gzhan ci ltar 'gyur ba te mi 'gyur ba kho na ste /
analyzed: bdag de la rdzas gzhan ci ltar 'gyur ba te mi 'gyur ba kho na ste /
translated: The response is ‚ÄúHow could that self be different from substance?‚Äù It could not be,

original: mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because it would not be observed. That is the meaning.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni chos can rdzas gcig med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni chos can rdzas gcig med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú Therefore . . . ‚Äù means that because the possessor of attributes does not exist as a single substance,

original: dogs pa ni sangs rgyas pas khyed la yang gzhi mthun pa der ci ltar 'gyur 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa ste bsgrub pa dang dgag pa'i tha snyad du yang ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: dogs pa ni sangs rgyas pas khyed la yang gzhi mthun pa der ci ltar 'gyur 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa ste bsgrub pa dang dgag pa'i tha snyad du yang ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúBut,‚Äù it may be objected, ‚Äúif the Buddhist is right, how can you say that the same thing is both a pot and not a pot? And how can you say that it is both established and refuted?

original: sgra la sogs pa chos can gcig gi dbang du byas te /
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa chos can gcig gi dbang du byas te /
translated: ‚ÄúSound, etc.,‚Äù are the subject.

original: rnam par rtog pa can gyi blos bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa can gyi blos bstan pa'o //
translated: They are taught by the conceptual mind.

original: chos can ci 'dra bar gcig ce na /
analyzed: chos can ci 'dra bar gcig ce na /
translated: ‚ÄúHow is the subject one?‚Äù

original: sna tshogs chos kyi gzhir gyur pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs chos kyi gzhir gyur pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the basis of various properties.

original: chos gcig bsgrub na ste /
analyzed: chos gcig bsgrub na ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIf one property is established,‚Äù

original: sgrub pa'i dus de ston pa dang zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de dang 'brel pa lta bu dang ; bsgrub pa dang dgag pa dag gis ma reg pa'i rang bzhin gzhan rnams btang snyoms lta bu dang ngo //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i dus de ston pa dang zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de dang 'brel pa lta bu dang ; bsgrub pa dang dgag pa dag gis ma reg pa'i rang bzhin gzhan rnams btang snyoms lta bu dang ngo //
translated: at the time of establishment, it is as if it were connected with the property to be established, and it is as if the other properties, which are not touched by the establishment or the refutation, are ignored.

original: chos gcig 'gog na ni dgag par bya ba'i chos de'i sa dben pa ste bri ba lta bu dang / de las gzhan dgag bar bya ba ma yin pa'i chos rnams la ltos pa lta bur ste /
analyzed: chos gcig 'gog na ni dgag par bya ba'i chos de'i sa dben pa ste bri ba lta bu dang / de las gzhan dgag bar bya ba ma yin pa'i chos rnams la ltos pa lta bur ste /
translated: If one thing is negated, then the place of the negated thing is empty, that is, it is as if it were diminished, and it is as if the other things that are not negated depend on it.

original: @210a * // de lta bu'i chos can bstan nas /
analyzed: @210a * // de lta bu'i chos can bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the entity that is the basis of the negation,

original: dgag pa dang bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad med ba'i don can ci ltar bstan ba de kho na bzhin du tha snyad de bstan pa don tha dad pa la brten pa ste /
analyzed: dgag pa dang bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad med ba'i don can ci ltar bstan ba de kho na bzhin du tha snyad de bstan pa don tha dad pa la brten pa ste /
translated: the entity that is the referent of the expression that is neither a negation nor an affirmation is taught just as it is.

original: gzhan sel ba la mi bden ba'i don can du ma brtags par khas len pa'i tha snyad byed pa po ni 'jig rten pa'i don la gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba la mi bden ba'i don can du ma brtags par khas len pa'i tha snyad byed pa po ni 'jig rten pa'i don la gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The one who uses expressions that are based on different referents, who does not accept that the referent of the expression is not real in terms of the exclusion of other, does not contradict the meaning of the world.

original: ci 'dra ba la zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba la zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: thog med ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: thog med ces bya ba ste /
translated: It is beginningless.

original: thog ma med pa'i bag chags las byung ba rnam par rtog ba'i blos bstan pa la'o //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i bag chags las byung ba rnam par rtog ba'i blos bstan pa la'o //
translated: It is taught by the conceptual mind that arises from beginningless latent propensities.

original: de lta ma yin na tha snyad nyid mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na tha snyad nyid mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the expression itself would not be tenable.

original: des na gang gis med par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: des na gang gis med par 'gyur ba /
translated: Therefore, by what means would it be nonexistent?

original: khyed cag bzhin du ded kyi ltar na ni tha snyad 'di don dam par ma yin no //
analyzed: khyed cag bzhin du ded kyi ltar na ni tha snyad 'di don dam par ma yin no //
translated: According to you, it is not ultimately, as it is conventionally.

original: 'chad pa ni kho bo cag gis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'chad pa ni kho bo cag gis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation is ‚Äúby us.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: gzhi mthun pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúCommon locus.‚Äù

original: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
translated: This is clarified:

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus.‚Äù

original: sgra'i sgra don zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sgra'i sgra don zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning of the word ‚Äúsound‚Äù is

original: sgra zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di'i don sgra'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de chos can nyid du 'jog go //
analyzed: sgra zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di'i don sgra'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de chos can nyid du 'jog go //
translated: the meaning of this word ‚Äúsound,‚Äù which is the characteristic of sound, is posited as the subject.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: sgra ma yin pa las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra ma yin pa las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom that which is not sound.‚Äù

original: rnam par 'jog pa'i rnam par brjod pa ni sgra zhes bya ba zhes so //
analyzed: rnam par 'jog pa'i rnam par brjod pa ni sgra zhes bya ba zhes so //
translated: The expression of the determination is ‚Äúsound.‚Äù

original: gal te sgra'i sgra'i don tshad ma gcig gis rtogs na mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa sgrub pa don med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te sgra'i sgra'i don tshad ma gcig gis rtogs na mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa sgrub pa don med do zhe na /
translated: If the meaning of the word ‚Äúsound‚Äù is understood by one valid cognition, then it is pointless to prove impermanence and so on.

original: sgra de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat sound‚Äù

original: phyin ci log gi tha snyad rtag ba nyid kyi tha snyad de mi rtag pa nyid zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log gi tha snyad rtag ba nyid kyi tha snyad de mi rtag pa nyid zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the conventional expression of the opposite, permanence, is subsumed in impermanence.

original: tha snyad gzhan zhes bya ba mi rtag pa nyid kyi tha snyad bcug pas so //
analyzed: tha snyad gzhan zhes bya ba mi rtag pa nyid kyi tha snyad bcug pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúAnother conventional expression‚Äù is the conventional expression of impermanence.

original: phyin ci log gi tha snyad kyang yul ni rtag ba nyid de de bsal ba'i phyir te bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log gi tha snyad kyang yul ni rtag ba nyid de de bsal ba'i phyir te bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The conventional expression of the opposite is the object, permanence, because it is eliminated, because it is reversed.

original: de'i tshe ni rnam par 'jog pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe ni rnam par 'jog pa'i dus na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time‚Äù is the time of determination.

original: rang bzhin gang gis rtogs snyam na /
analyzed: rang bzhin gang gis rtogs snyam na /
translated: By what nature is it understood?

original: bdag gis ngo bor ro //
analyzed: bdag gis ngo bor ro //
translated: By the nature of self.

original: ci 'dra ba'i khyad par can du zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba'i khyad par can du zhe na /
translated: What kind of distinction is it?

original: de la brtan pa ste mi rtag pa'i chos brten pa'i 'gog pa ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la brtan pa ste mi rtag pa'i chos brten pa'i 'gog pa ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe cessation of that which is dependent on impermanence‚Äù is

original: gang gis tshe sgra rtag pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa de'i tshe sgra las rtag ba nyid de dang bral bar ro //
analyzed: gang gis tshe sgra rtag pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa de'i tshe sgra las rtag ba nyid de dang bral bar ro //
translated: when it is said that sound is impermanent, at that time sound is separated from permanence.

original: des dpen pa ni rtag pa nyid kyis dben pa'o //
analyzed: des dpen pa ni rtag pa nyid kyis dben pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that separation‚Äù is separation from permanence.

original: rtag pa nyid de las bzlog pa'i chos mi rtag pa nyid kyi chos la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du chos can rtogs so //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid de las bzlog pa'i chos mi rtag pa nyid kyi chos la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du chos can rtogs so //
translated: The impermanence of the thing, which is the opposite of permanence, is the property to be established.

original: 'dis ci zhig brjod par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'dis ci zhig brjod par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the point of this?

original: bsgrub pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The point is to establish the property to be established.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /üîΩ'di ltar zhes bya ba'o @210b 'di kho na la bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni / 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o @210b 'di kho na la bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is clarified by the following.

original: sgra mi rtag pa nyid du kho bos sngar rtogs te rtag par ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bur ro //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag pa nyid du kho bos sngar rtogs te rtag par ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bur ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äújust like that‚Äù means that ‚ÄúI previously understood sound to be impermanent, not permanent.‚Äù

original: de bzhin nyid du zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid 'dzin pa nyid du dus phyis byung ba'i skad cig ma nyid kyi rjes su dpag bas tha snyad kyi yul nyid du 'grub ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid 'dzin pa nyid du dus phyis byung ba'i skad cig ma nyid kyi rjes su dpag bas tha snyad kyi yul nyid du 'grub ba yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin just the same way‚Äù means that the later moment of the cognition of impermanence is established as the object of the convention by the inference of the later moment of the cognition of impermanence.

original: gang zhig ce na /üîΩde nyid ces bya ba ste sngar gyi dus na yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang zhig ce na / de nyid ces bya ba ste sngar gyi dus na yod pa nyid do //
translated: What is it?üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúthat very thing‚Äù refers to the thing that existed in the past.

original: dngos po ni de lta bu'i rang bzhin can du zhes bya ba 'chad ba ni /
analyzed: dngos po ni de lta bu'i rang bzhin can du zhes bya ba 'chad ba ni /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe thing that has such a nature‚Äù is an explanation of the above.

original: de la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: That means

original: phyi rol gyi don la'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don la'o //
translated: in regard to external objects.

original: gal te sgra rnams kyi yul mngon sum gyis rtogs pa nyid ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te sgra rnams kyi yul mngon sum gyis rtogs pa nyid ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
translated: If the objects of words are directly perceived, why is it not so?

original: rnam par rtog ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Conceptualization means.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni /
translated: At that time means

original: rnam par rtog pa'i dus na mngon sum gyis rtogs pa de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i dus na mngon sum gyis rtogs pa de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: at the time of conceptualization, because direct perception does not perceive.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyis rtogs yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyis rtogs yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: For that very reason means because it is not an object of direct perception.

original: ci'i phyir 'di nyid kyi don 'di yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di nyid kyi don 'di yin zhe na /
translated: Why is the meaning of this very [passage] like this?

original: 'khrul pa tsam zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa tsam zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Mere error means.

original: gzhan sel ba'i yul la 'khrul pa zlog par byed pa nyid kyis ma khyab po zhes dogs pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba'i yul la 'khrul pa zlog par byed pa nyid kyis ma khyab po zhes dogs pa ni /
translated: It is not pervaded by the negation of error in regard to the object of exclusion of other. The doubt is:

original: 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Well then, means.

original: gang gi cha 'khrul ba ma zhugs she na /
analyzed: gang gi cha 'khrul ba ma zhugs she na /
translated: In what part does error not enter?

original: mngon sum gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Direct perception means.

original: ci ltar rnam par rtog pa gzhan sel ba'i yul can du 'gyur zhe na zhes bya bar yang blta bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar rnam par rtog pa gzhan sel ba'i yul can du 'gyur zhe na zhes bya bar yang blta bar bya ba'o //
translated: How can it be a subject that excludes other concepts?üîΩThe object of equanimity is not an object of engagement.

original: mi 'jug pa'i yul zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i yul ma yin la /üîΩ'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa yang btang snyoms kyi yul te /
analyzed: mi 'jug pa'i yul zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i yul ma yin la / 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa yang btang snyoms kyi yul te /
translated: The object of engagement is not an object of equanimity.

original: de ni me 'dir yang ngo //
analyzed: de ni me 'dir yang ngo //
translated: This is also the case with fire.

original: bzlog pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bzlog pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The opposite is not.

original: gal te yang the tshom dang phyin ci log med pa de lta yang btang snyoms kyi yul bzlog pa nyid sgra dang rnam par rtog pa dag gi yul yin no //
analyzed: gal te yang the tshom dang phyin ci log med pa de lta yang btang snyoms kyi yul bzlog pa nyid sgra dang rnam par rtog pa dag gi yul yin no //
translated: Even if there is no doubt or error, the object of equanimity is still the object of words and concepts.

original: me'i rang gi ngo bo nyid don du ci ste mi 'dod ce na /
analyzed: me'i rang gi ngo bo nyid don du ci ste mi 'dod ce na /
translated: Why is the intrinsic reality of fire not accepted as the object?

original: der zhes bya ba ste rnam par rtog pa la'o //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ste rnam par rtog pa la'o //
translated: In that, i.e., in the concept.üîΩIf the intrinsic reality of fire is not the object, then what is the object?
